Details: ['Mark Radcliffe', 'Experienced Silicon Valley Corporate and IP Transaction Lawyer', 'Palo Alto, California, Estados Unidos']
About:
['I work with technology companies and companies that use technology throughout the world. I have been working in Silicon Valley for over 30 years. I particularly enjoy applying the law to the issues raised by new technologies, such as blockchain, open source software, IoT and domain names. My clients range from Fortune 500 such as Oracle Corporation and Sony Corporation to unknown startups. Currently, my team and I are working with over 50 startups. I have worked across a wide variety of industries, including software (in particular open source software), blockchain, IoT, semiconductor, consumer electronics, content licensing (from music to characters), and medical devices. During my career, I have advised companies and investors on over 1,000 venture capital transaction. The following are some of my projects:

Assisted several large companies in developing open source strategies

Started and manage the corporate venture capital practice at DLA Piper

General counsel to OSI and serve on Apache Software Foundation Legal Committee on a pro bono basis

General counsel to the OpenStack Foundation (open source cloud computing project)

Assisted the Navajo Nation in adopting a modified version of Article II of the UCC

Assisted blockchain startup in its licensing strategy

Assisted on ICOs

Assisted Network Solutions in developing the first domain dispute resolution policy in 1994 (still used in current ICANN Dispute Resolution Policy)

Assisted Dr. Suess Estate in determining what words, characters and symbols to register as trademarks

Assisted major corporation in obtaining a license from a financially troubled company with a $40M prepaid royalty and ensured that the license would survive bankruptcy

Assisted large Asian company in developing IP asset management strategy for its 50,000 patents


Specialties: Developing and implementing strategies to protect and exploit intellectual property for clients; venture capital financing; blockchain; and licensing.']

Details: ['Laura S.', 'Senior Lawyer, ICSA qualified', 'Reino Unido']
About:
['16 PQE lawyer. Laura has 22 years’ experience in law, compliance and governance and has held senior roles. As Head of Legal and Compliance at the international body for accounting standards, Laura supported the significant investment in enhancing and protecting its IP portfolio, translating its standards for use world-wide, on-boarding a large number of jurisdictions which through legislation or agreements were agreeing to use the standards and securing additional income.

Laura was a senior project manager at the UK’s accounting standards body (FRC) managing risks to its income and new income being secured following the reduction of government funding. Laura then went on to be the sole corporate counsel at the UK membership body for actuaries where she supported the Board on internal and external arrangements during its re-structure and helped leverage key relationships on areas of joined interest including with the FCA and FRC.

More recently Laura was Senior Legal Counsel leading on data protection and privacy remediation, data licensing terms and exchange related investigations and remediation at one of the largest international brokerage businesses which is part of the Cantor group. Laura is currently a Senior Lawyer and Company Secretary at Open Banking Limited and is supporting the Board in governance changes that will affect how the organisation operates in future.

Laura’s in-house experience has been gained working for regulatory bodies and in financial services and has involved a number of projects spanning across the business as regards MiFID II, SMCR, Brexit and GDPR to name a few.']

Details: ['Alex Hamilton', 'CEO of Radiant Law and author of SIGN HERE: the enterprise guide to closing contracts quickly', 'Londres, Inglaterra, Reino Unido']
About:
['Alex Hamilton is the CEO and founder of Radiant Law, the UK-based award-winning NewLaw firm, and the author of SIGN HERE: the enterprise guide to closing contracts quickly.

Alex spends much of his time working on improving the contracting process for clients and leads product and tech development. He also regularly talks and writes on improving contracting, LawTech and the changing legal industry. He is a fellow of the College of Law Practice Management, has led a number of projects that have been recognised by the FT’s Innovative Lawyer Awards and was once shortlisted for Innovative Lawyer of the Year.

Alex is a qualified lawyer in England and New York and specialised in outsourcing, technology and commercial contracts when he used to do deals. Before founding Radiant Law, he was a Partner at Latham & Watkins and co-Chair of Latham & Watkins’ global Technology Transactions Group.

Twitter (where he shares stronger opinions than on LinkedIn): @alexhamiltonrad']

Details: ['Cecilia Ziniti', 'General Counsel | Investor | Advisor | Board Member', 'San Francisco y alrededores']
About:
["Business-first legal and technology executive and general counsel with a strong track record of accelerating company and product success. 

Ex-big firm (Morrison & Foerster), Ex-Amazon (first FT lawyer on Alexa) builder and leader of high-performing legal and compliance teams and functions at multiple venture-backed companies. Agile generalist adept across the full stack of stakeholder needs. Particular expertise in complex spaces like AI/data, software, and fintech.

On the corporate side, I’ve closed over $175M in venture capital funding over four rounds and served as corporate secretary to boards of directors for 18 quarters. I’ve partnered on, problem solved, and negotiated hundreds of commercial transactions across disciplines - from SaaS, to global retail distribution, to investment pools, to marketing/trademark licenses, to real estate and venture debt.

I also take seriously my roles as a cross-functional collaborator, company leader, and mentor and developer of high-performing teams. More recently, I've gotten deeply involved in the legal and tech communities including as an angel investor and advisor. I frequently speak on law, leadership, women & tech, and innovation."]

At the top of my list is Cecilia. She supported my team's efforts on Amazon Echo and Alexa and every aspect of working with her was world class. She embodies Amazon's leadership principles, particularly Customer Obsession, Deliver Results, and Insist on Highest Standards (if you are not familiar with Amazon's 14 Leadership Principles check them out). The nature of the product we collaborated on meant tons of interesting issues having to do with privacy, security, and customer trust. If she said she would get us a document or contract review back she'd do it, on time. I hope I get to work with her again someday."], ['Shamitha Somashekar', 'Product Strategy & Management at Apple - AI/ML', "Cecilia's practical, tailored, and useful advice, combined with her understanding of the business and customer, made her a very valuable partner and counsel for the Product Management team. Additionally, she was very detail oriented and was able to provide very valuable feedback on our strategies and documents.'], ['Ahmed Bouzid', 'Founder & CEO @ Witlingo | Alumn: Amazon (Echo) / Genesys / Angel.com / Unisys | Columnist at CMS Wire | Guest Author @ Opus | Ambassador @ Open Voice Network | Advisor @ HLT Georgetown | #Audio-NFTs | Proud Hokie | DZ', "Cecilia is by far and away the best counsel that I have ever had the privilege to work with. Details: ['Mark Webber', 'US Managing Partner @ Fieldfisher', 'San Francisco y alrededores']
About:
["As the US Managing Partner heading up the US operations of Fieldfisher I'm based full-time in Silicon Valley. I'm a European digital regulation and technology transactions lawyer. EU privacy and data laws underpin almost every transaction or issue I support. I hold the CIPP/E and am an IAPP Privacy Faculty Member.

I advise technology and IP-rich business on EU sales, licensing and online compliance issues. Particularly where there is a disruptive or online component to the proposed transaction.

With 18 years of experience advising on technology deals, I advise where cloud, digital and online technologies converge. When businesses leverage technology, IP and/or data to drive revenue they face the issues I specialize in. My practice is focused on internet, ecommerce, e-marketing and cloud/SaaS. Inevitably privacy and security, but wider digital regulation and contracting issues too. Where does EU regulation bite? How can the internet, online platforms, partnering, sales channels contribute to sales success and what legal issues or hurdles need overcoming?

Whether an emerging-growth or listed enterprise, when the decision to internationalize or scale internationally comes this inevitably leads a GC or senior management team to deal with unfamiliar legal regimes. For over 18 years I’ve worked alongside such individuals in FDI, investing, selling or licensing product or exploring online activities in the EU.

It’s my job to ease the international expansion, compliance and sales process.

I am registered with the California Bar to practise English and EU law as an Foreign Legal Consultant.

Specialties: Internet and online regulation (including privacy under the Directive and GDPR)
Cloud (IaaS and PaaS)
SaaS
Digital Media
Product counseling and launch compliance reviews
Innovative and Complex Technology Transactions
Inward Investment (into EU)
Sales Channels (structuring and implementation)
Ecommerce

Details: ['Noric Dilanchian', 'Managing Partner at DILANCHIAN | Lawyers & Consultants', 'Sídney y alrededores']
About:
["Call for a conversation. | In my 38-year career in business and law my usual assignments involve building on the points of distinction of a client's venture (especially its intellectual property) and then contractually structuring the business and its ventures. Since 1983 I have had roles as an in-house counsel; solicitor in private practice in national, mid-tier and small law firms; and commercialisation consultant (in particular for new businesses, intellectual property and information technology products and services).

As a LEGALTECH INNOVATOR I have developed and maintain a documents database of thousands of contracts and related templates to deliver cost-effective advice. This reflects the value I give to CODE STANDARDISATION AND RE-USE and the application of multidisciplinary know-how for business functions, processes and workflows.

As an INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY AND IT LAWYER I advise on trade marks, brands, copyrights, confidential information, pre-filing patent applications, patent licensing, information and entertainment content, computer programs, inventions, formulations, courseware and business systems.

As a CONTRACTS LAWYER I have reviewed, prepared or advised on over 5,000 contracts. They include contracts for - internet ventures, software, content owners, food and beverage distribution, joint ventures, shareholders, employees, independent contractors, licensing, technology transfer, publishing, ecommerce, mobile apps and commercialisation.

Call for a conversation.

Noric Dilanchian | Managing Partner
DILANCHIAN | Lawyers & Consultants

She is a proactive and creative legal mind. She does not shy away from difficult topics, such as unconscious bias, gender equality, and uplifting anyone with whom she comes in contact. Her experience, willingness to tackle any challenge, and her passion for success make her a significant asset to any company, board, or conference.'], ['Orijit (Ori) Das', 'Group General Counsel & Corporate SVP', 'To my mind there are very few General Counsel\'s who can be described as an iron fist in a velvet glove. Carolyn is certainly one of them. She comes with oodles of experience and brings that to bear in difficult situations, where she would routinely use her skills to solve for the situation. Carolyn in an "International Citizen" and is equally comfortable in a Board Room in Paris as she would be in the Silicon valley, thus bringing with her a unique set of skills needed in a global corporation.'], ['Janet Bawcom', 'General Counsel at Filtration Group Corporation. Experienced C-Suite executive, General Counsel, Corporate Secretary and Chief Compliance Officer', 'Carolyn is a person who makes things happen. I have worked with her on multiple leadership and development efforts and I’ve grown to rely on her as a trusted colleague who brings incredible legal expertise to any issue and a practical approach to the work of in-house counsel. She is the advisor I call to talk though issues and bounce ideas off of --- she is so capable at engaging and understanding a business issue and then identifying the legal complexities and challenges quickly, that trait alone makes her a gem. But then she then brings to the discussion a thoughtful and practical leadership style and see very quickly how to get to a solution that works and actually implement it. Carolyn has a gift for engaging others and getting them excited about an issue and working toward a solution. People are drawn to her and want to work in her ideas (and on her team). Her ability to see the problem, see the solution, and then actually make it all happen is the reason that I go to her for help and advice on a regular basis. I highly recommend her.'], ['Elaine Hutton', 'European General Counsel at Shiseido Group EMEA', "Carolyn is one of my most trusted industry colleagues - she's incredibly articulate, super smart and yet despite the many demands of her high profile international role at Symantec and work for the Association of Corporate Counsel Europe, Carolyn makes time to help others and her advice is always particularly wise and insightful. Carolyn is a rare gem as well as a true class act - it's an honour to know her."], ['Romny Gray', 'General Counsel, shortlisted for the 2019 Law Society In-House Team Excellence Award', 'Carolyn is a superbly smart and talented lawyer and manager. I have always been impressed by her interpersonal skills, organisational savviness, intellect, energy and flair. She is great fun to work alongside, is extremely popular and always delivers. A treasure to have in any executive team!'], ['Steven Chung', 'President, Worldwide Field Operations at Delphix', 'Prior to her current role in Europe, Caroyln led the legal team that supported my Symantec sales team in the Americas, and was one of the best legal partners with whom I have had the pleasure to work in the software industry. Smart, hard-working, innovative, and customer focused, Carolyn is a natural leader and amazing talent. She fostered a "can do" attitude with her team who helped to close complex, seven and eight figure transactions despite extreme time constraints and heavy volume, e.g. processing 500-750 orders per quarter. She was also an innovator, helping to revamp legal vehicles, integrate various contracts from M&As, and streamline our processes to serve clients, e..g Bid/QA process; standard contract templates; change orders; order management. Besides her exceptional professionalism, Carolyn was extremely personable and built excellent relationships. Overall, she is an "A+" talent that any software company would be lucky to have on the team. I hope we can work together again some day.'], ['Ellen Ostrow', 'Founding Principal, Lawyers Life Coach LLC', "Carolyn brings the energy and commitment of five people to her work - she's really extraordinary. The professional growth of her team is paramount to her - she understands how much the engagement of her staff influences their productivity. She combines her caring about people with her commitment to the business in an insightful and strategic way. I applaud her as a manager and a leader."]]

Details: ['Rish Handa', 'Lawyer for Business | Technology and IP | Privacy and Cybersecurity', 'Canadá']
About:
["I practice in the following legal sectors: Corporate/Commercial | Technology | Privacy & Cybersecurity | Intellectual Property (IP) . I represent clients at all stages, from emerging companies to large enterprises. 

 ▪ Current projects: Privacy and cybersecurity developments, including Quebec's reformed private-sector privacy law (Bill 64).
▪ Current topics of interest: AI and IOT.

My technology and intellectual property legal practice primarily includes advising clients with regard to IP licensing arrangements, SaaS agreements, commercialization and funding arrangements, and patent/copyright matters.

My privacy and cybersecurity practice includes advising clients with respect to privacy matters (federal, provincial, and international), anti-spam compliance, and cybersecurity standards. I also act as breach counsel for data security incidents.

My corporate/commercial practice primarily includes private acquisition and divestiture transactions, financings, and reorganizations, in addition to a variety of day-to-day commercial matters, including complex services arrangements.

Keywords: #technologylaw, #intellectualproperty, #iplaw,, #licensing, #privacy, #gdpr, #pipeda, #databreach, #casl, #anti-spam, #cybersecurity, #artificialintelligence, #ai, #ml, #iot, #software, #opensource, #computerlaw, #internetlaw, #roboticslaw, #ecommerce, #outsourcing, #mobileapps, #fintech, #healthtech"]

Details: ['Mladen Vukmir', 'VUKMIR & ASSOCIATES, LLC, Founding Partner', 'Zagreb, Condado de Zagreb, Croacia']
About:
['After completing the law education at Zagreb University Law School, Mladen obtained Master of Intellectual Property degree at Franklin Pierce Law Center in Concord (UNH), NH, USA. He started as an associate at Hanzekovic & Partners law firm in Zagreb and was a visiting lawyer at: Fenwick & West in Palo Alto, CA, USA; Monahan Duhot, Paris, France and Pavia e Ansaldo, Milan, Italy. In 1991 he founded VUKMIR & ASSOCIATES. Mladen is a patent and trademark agent, admitted to practice before the CSIPO, EUIPO and European Patent Office. During the Croatian EU accession negotiations he participated as an expert on enforcement in the IP Chapter Working Group. He advised on preparations for the Manual on Technology Transfer at UNIDO.

Mladen wrote numerous articles and lectured on various topics on intellectual property, including regular teaching as an adjunct lecturer at the University of Zagreb Faculty of Law graduate and postgraduate courses. He is an arbitrator on the Panel of domestic disputes at the Permanent Arbitration Court at the Croatian Chamber of Commerce, panelist on the UDRP Domain Name Panel at WIPO AMC, a distinguished neutral on the CPR Panels of Neutrals and at the INTA PON and is an IMI certified mediator. Mladen is a member AIPPI, ECTA, IBA, ITechLaw, GALA, INTA, LES, UIA & ABA.

Mladen also served as a consultant to various domestic and international organizations such as the Croatian Ministry of Science and Technology, Serbian Intellectual Property Office (PLAC), World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO), the World Bank and the European Commission (CARDS 2002 and IPA 2009) and GLG Council.

He is Royal Danish Consul General (Hon.) in Zagreb (decorated, Knight of the Order of Dannebrog 2n degree).

Specialties: Intellectual property (copyright, trademark, design, business secrets, patent, geographical indications, unfair competition), IT, media and advertising, branding and identity strategies, ADR and mediation.']

Details: ['Gerard Stegmaier', 'Practical Problem Solver + Trusted Consigliere', 'Washington DC-Baltimore y alrededores']
About:
['Information is the asset class of the 21st century. I help dreamers become doers and help doers make and execute difficult decisions especially in crises.

I trained in law nearly 25 years ago and use this background to provide strategic and legal data-related advice.

I leverage my corporate governance and internal investigations background to serve as a trusted adviser to boards and executives on data security breaches, class actions and privacy and consumer protection-related investigations at agencies such as the SEC, FTC and state attorneys general.

I act as general counsel for and invest and advise in data-centric fast growth enterprises from idea to exit and beyond. My strategic transaction experience includes M&A transactions at transaction sizes ranging from under $100 million to several billion dollars. Venture capitalists, private equity sponsors, angels and founders count on me to help them develop, execute and defend data strategies.

I focus on digital health, technology, media, IP, security, online advertising, predictive analytics and machine learning and artificial intelligence matters.

I have game-changing experience acting as product counsel for new and emerging services in the digital health, Internet, Internet-of-Things, SaaS/cloud, adtech, location services and auto verticals and have worked on products and services loved by billions of consumers.

I routinely assist late-stage private companies to mature their processes and governance in anticipation of public offerings focusing on practical, actionable, cost-effective solutions.

Members of Congress, regulators and principals rely on my counsel and I have spoken before groups including Harvard Business School, Virginia’s Darden School of Business, Georgetown Law School and the United States Department of State. The Wall Street Journal, Washington Post, Fortune, CNN, Bloomberg and other media seek out my perspective.

I enjoy helping those I assist remain calm, solve difficult problems with new thinking and have fun -- especially when in crisis.']

Details: ['Maria Koval', 'Helping businesses effectively protect IP | Head of IP, IT and Data protection practice at PwC Ukraine | WIPO domain name disputes Arbitrator', 'Área metropolitana de Kiev']
About:
["I am a passionate and highly professional IP lawyer with 18 years of significant experience. 

Now, I am a Head of IP, IT & Data protection practice at PwC Ukraine. 

Having started my professional career in 2002 in one of the leading Ukrainian IP company, I was engaged in all IP issues, including the protection of trademarks, designs, inventions, domain names, copyright, trade secrets, data, marketing, license and franchising agreements.

I have a long track record of advising foreign, multinational and Ukrainian companies on various IP issues such as possible rights infringements, strategies on IP rights protection, license and franchise agreements.

From 2003 I regularly handles lawsuits (litigations) on various Intellectual Property issues, many of which are much complicated.

From 2018 I am a Domain Name Panelist (Arbitrator) of the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) Arbitration and Mediation Center.

I have resolved more than 40 domain names disputes.
My experience covers TMT, advertising and marketing, FMCG, pharmaceuticals and medical devices, food and beverage.

I am a member of the Ukrainian Bar Association and Pharmaceutical Trade Marks Group.

Some rankings for better understanding of the level of my competence:

• Recommended as one of the leading IP lawyers by Chambers Europe 2020.
• Ranked as a leading IP lawyer by Best Lawyers International 2019-2020
• Ranked as a leading IT lawyer by Best Lawyers International 2019.
• One of the best lawyers in Intellectual Property According to the international ranking Best Lawyers International 2018
• High praise by the clients in Intellectual Property according to the independent research by international directory The Legal 500 -EMEA 2017

My top cases are:

• Successful court representation of Rolex SA (Switzerland), Yamaha Corporation (Japan), Novartis AG (Switzerland), Bayer Schering Pharma Aktiengesellschaft, Arena Distribution SA, Carlsberg Group (Ukraine), in trademark litigations;
• Successful representation of a manufacturer of beverages and snacks New Products LLC (Ukraine) in the Antimonopoly Committee and in court;
• Acknowledgement of trademarks NEMIROFF, YAMAHA, ROLEX, LVIVSKE as well-known in Ukraine

With my assistance, you will forget about any problems related to IP protection.

Become my client today, and be confident tomorrow!

So don't hesitate to contact me directly with your request.

+ 38 067 4460481
mariia.koval@pwc.com"]

Details: ['Mariano Municoy', 'Head of Legal Department at Moeller IP', 'Argentina']
About:
['I am a lawyer and IP agent with more than 20 years of practical and academic experience dealing with the full range of IP issues locally (Argentina), regionally (Latin America) and internationally. 

Since March 2005 I have been working for the Latin American IP law firm Moeller IP Advisors where I advise and design legal/business strategies related to the creation, protection and enforcement of the whole range of IP rights such as patents, trade secrets, plant variety rights, trademarks, designs, domain names, advertisement claims, copyright as well as anti-counterfeiting, licensing, transfer of technology and regulatory affairs matters related to pharmaceuticals, medical devices, food products and the like.

So I am an active member of IP organizations such as INTA, IPO and ABA; plus I regularly teach different IP course at Austral University, San Andres University (both in Argentina) as well as in Chicago-Kent (USA).

In February 2016 I was appointed Director of Business and Professional development, in November 2017 a partner at Moeller IP Advisors and in November 2018 Head of Moeller Legal Department where I have been managing projects performed by a group of lawyers and technical experts handling patents and IP litigation, regulatory affairs, plant varieties rights, personal data protection and other legal areas related to innovation and technology migrating to the digital world.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mariano had started working on different civil and criminal courts in Buenos Aires since the beginning of his legal studies in 1996 until he received his law degree with specialization on administrative law from the Universidad de Buenos Aires in November 2001.
Then he joined a general practice law firm and afterwards pursued an LL.M. in International Intellectual Property Law from Chicago-Kent, which we achieved with high honors in 2004. In 2008, Mariano completed a second LL.M. in Law and Economics from the Universidad Torcuato Di Tella in Argentina.']

Details: ['Bijal V. Vakil', 'Partner | Technology Practice | Allen & Overy', 'Palo Alto, California, Estados Unidos']
About:
['Bijal is a partner in our Technology Industry Practice and the Global Intellectual Property Group. He successfully represents technology companies in all aspects of their life cycle on corporate matters as well. He also has an impressive track record litigating complex patent cases in district courts, the International Trade Commission, and before the Federal Circuit. The knowledge and insight he brings to the most complex technology and intellectual property matters globally make him a valued asset for companies ranging from those on the Fortune 100 list to Silicon Valley startups.

Bijal's practice covers a wide range of technologies, including computer software, semiconductors, drones, e-commerce, social media, payments, autonomous vehicles, consumer electronics, telecommunications, video games, medical devices and innovative uses of blockchain technology in cryptocurrency. His technology practice includes serving as lead counsel in hundreds of contentious patent matters, leading US and cross-border deals, strategizing on complex technology transactions and forming technology alliances in trailblazing industries.

-Bijal is ranked in IAM Patent 1000 – World’s Leading Patent Professionals and IAM 300 Global - World’s Leading IP Strategists.
-Chambers USA calls him a "litigator who is 'well versed in both legal and business matters’ and is lauded for his strategic guidance and skill in negotiation. He handles contentious hi-tech patent matters including infringement claims made by nonpracticing entities."
-IAM Strategy 300 2020 says, "Bijal Vakil offers so much to innovators in the form of portfolio development, licensing and litigation expertise. The Silicon Valley partner knows the way the patent and business winds are blowing and accordingly adjusts to optimal strategies with agility."
-IAM 1000 2020 quotes a client: "[Bijal] is a really good strategic lawyer, [he] builds cases brilliantly and is able to spot and exploit the weaknesses in opponents' positions."
-Two-time winner of the Burton Awards/Law 360 Distinguished Writing Awards.

Details: ['Serhat Koç', 'Founding Partner at Koç & Koç Law Office', 'Besiktas, Estambul, Turquía']
About:
['Contact & ask how me and my team can help you achieve success in Turkish market. I’d love to provide you with a detailed presentation of our works, and share collective insights from my team and our partners in the country.

I have a strong academic record, as well as a keen personal interest in Internet and professional research on Internet related law practice. I have deepened my career in order to be in line with my specific area of interest, which is information technology and intellectual property rights.

My specialization in different ranges of online services can be briefly expressed as an IT attorney at law and policy expert.

During my professional life, I happened to get involved with online media on a more organizational basis as having chance to gain experiences in Regulation of Audio-visual sectors or projects in media, government and NGO cooperation. I have represented some of the biggest ISPs, media corporations, e-trade companies, online advertisement companies, software and computer games companies in Turkey and worldwide. Being a part of the firm and undertaking responsibilities helped me to enhance my legal skills and to acquire an analytic acumen.

It also demonstrated the gaps in the jurisdiction and taught me how to take initiatives regarding the solutions of the conflicts about the IT and IP rights especially at the level of cyberspace Law.
Being an IT and IP Law expert on the issues concerning Turkey’s cyber Law policies, Internet censorships and how to solve legal problems of consumer-focused online environment matters led the conclusion of me proving myself as a communicator and having presentation skills.']

Details: ['Elizabeth Ward', 'The Brand Expert. Advisor to many big brand owners and sought after by Forbes and the BBC for advise and insight in brand disputes.', 'Leeds, Inglaterra, Reino Unido']
About:
["Whether your problem is how to protect your brand or how do you make money from your trade marks and ideas, I lead a team who can help you. Our mantra is, if we can't add value to your business, then we will tell you and send you away to rethink things! This relentless focus on our clients interest and winning whenever we can is precisely what has made us an award winning team. We're not reactive, we're proactive. We treat you as a long term partner and treat you accordingly. As a lawyer, a former scientist in the pharma industry, & a business owner, I understand business. I take a commercial and straightforward approach. No jargon - just plain English. #intellectualproperty #trademarks

I’m considered one of the leading IP solicitors in the UK:
‘A Leader in the Field’ (of IP, ranked 2009 - 2020, Chambers & Partners)
Supervising Solicitor to execute Search Orders & Freezing Orders
5-star Author: If You’re so Clever Why Aren’t You Rich? IP - 10 Ways to Take Your Genius to the Bank

My team of specialist IP lawyers & I work with:

IN-HOUSE COUNSEL to support them in IP disputes and strategies e.g. managing trade mark portfolios.

BUSINESS OWNERS & LEADERS of fast-growth co’s looking to raise funds or export & expand overseas. I can determine & create the right distribution model to keep control of key assets & protect against counterfeiting.

SCIENTISTS & TECH ENTREPRENEURS to establish value in ideas & products; new products, re-purposing existing drugs, and/or combining new tech e.g. targeted use of therapeutics. Finding & protecting the value of data e.g. trial results.

BRAND PORTFOLIO MANAGERS, CREATIVES, MARKETERS to do brand & trade mark clearance searches (global), register new brands, maintain brand & trade mark portfolios. Actively manage anti-counterfeit efforts, monitoring goods, working w/ suppliers, setting up alerts & working with Government agencies e.g. HMRC & UK Border Agency."]

Details: ['Ian Finch', 'Partner at James & Wells | Intellectual Property, Patents, Trade Marks', 'Nueva Zelanda']
About:
['I have been employed in the Intellectual Property field since 1991 specialising in IP litigation since the late 1990's.

During this time I have acted for many local and multi-national companies helping them to obtain and enforce their rights in New Zealand. I provide opinions on the validity and infringement of patents, copyright and trade marks, as well as advice regarding trade secrets and consumer protection legislation such as the Fair Trading Act.

I have extensive litigation experience across a range of industries with particular emphasis on the construction, manufacturing and engineering industries.

I have been lead counsel in many of New Zealand’s leading intellectual property decisions - including the first copyright case to be considered by our Supreme Court.

I am the general editor of "James & Wells Intellectual Property Law in New Zealand”, published by Thomson Reuters, and have been a speaker at numerous conferences on the subject of intellectual property enforcement. I am also individually recommended by PLC Which lawyer? in the field of Intellectual Property.

I currently sit on the Advisory Boards of Award Attachments LImited and the Auckland University of Technology Business Innovation Centre, helping advise start ups on a broad range of intellectual property and commercial issues.

Finally, I am Past-President of the New Zealand Institute of Patent Attorneys.

Specialties: Intellectual property protection and litigation - particularly in the the construction, manufacturing and engineering industries.']

['AAA Law has been providing legal services since 1992. Our clients include more than 10,000 foreign and local companies. AAA Law, a.k.a. AAA Baltic Service Company, AAA Legal Services and AAA, specializes in: 
• Intellectual Property law, 
• Corporate law, 
• Banking & Finance law,
• Pharmacy and Health Care law,
• Litigation.

We have offices in Lithuania, Estonia, Latvia, representatives in other countries. We provide quality professional services for reasonable fees.

The legal directories Chambers Europe, Legal 500, Managing Intellectual Property consistently rank our firm as one of the best IP firms in the Baltic States.

Details: ['Michael B. Stewart - Intl Patent Attorney', 'Litigator and Intellectual Property Specialist, Patent Law, Intellectual Property Law, Trademark Law, Copyright Law, IT Law', 'Bloomfield Hills, Michigan, Estados Unidos']
About:
['Fishman Stewart attorneys are dedicated to the practice of intellectual property law. 
As strategic advisors to CEOs and senior executives throughout the world, we help maximize the value of our client’s “intellectual capital”.

With our worldwide clients, Fishman Stewart is an intellectual property law firm that specializes in identifying, securing and advancing creativity.

In addition to my Juris Doctorate, I have a master's degree in engineering and an English degree.

I am a frequent speaker on intellectual property protection and enforcement. My presentations have included audiences associated with many organizations including universities, bar associations, the United States Patent and Trademark Office, the National Science Foundation, the American Intellectual Property Law Association and the International Trademark Association. My articles have been published by numerous publications and I am on the editorial board for the Engineering Society of Detroit.

I work in a wide range of technical areas including mechanical, aerospace, electrical, computer, and nuclear engineering. My practice encompasses domestic and foreign patent prosecution, e-commerce and information technology, patent opinions, intellectual property litigation (including domain name arbitration proceedings, and both state and federal court actions), mediations and arbitrations, domestic and foreign trademark prosecution, trademark opinions, copyrights, trade secrets, rights of publicity, intellectual property evaluations/due diligence, and agreements.

@navigateip, which can be found on either Twitter(R) "twitter.com/navigateip" or Facebook(R) "facebook.com/navigateip", is a microblog providing a culling of stories and solutions directed toward creative innovations in technology, privacy and intellectual property (e.g., patents, copyrights, trademarks and trade secrets).']

Details: ['Rafael Castro Meza', 'Abogado Senior División Ambiental y Regulatoria Montt y Cía. en Montt Group', 'Chile']
About:
['Abogado U. de Chile y Magister en Derecho Ambiental de la misma casa de estudios, con una experiencia de 17 años en el sector público, en muy distintos ámbitos de ejercicio, que mezcla la defensa de los intereses fiscales, gestión del territorio fiscal y conocimientos en derecho administrativo y regulatorio en general. Amplia adaptabilidad a nuevos ambientes de trabajo. Capacidad de generación de sinergia con profesionales de distintas especializaciones. Me he desempeñado en el Servicio Nacional de Menores, Consejo de Defensa del Estado, en los Ministerios de Bienes Nacionales y Minería, en la Facultad de Cs. Físicas y Matemáticas de la U. de Chile, como asesor Legislativo en el Senado de la República de Chile, como Secretario Regional Ministerial del Medio Ambiente y Administrador Regional de Antofagasta; y a partir de Julio de 2021 como Abogado Senior de la sección Ambiental y Regulatoria del estudio Montt y Cía.

Profesional proactivo, Orientado al logro, con gran manejo de trabajo en equipo y liderazgo y coordinación de los mismos. Extensa participación en voluntariado social. Trabajo con organizaciones sociales y comunidades. Excelente trato y manejo de conflictos sociales. Ex jefe de Grupo Scout y Presidente de la Corporación Club Deportivo Magallanes.

Durante los años 2015 y 2016 cursé los Diplomados I y II, en Derecho Ambiental de la Facultad de Derecho de la U. de Chile conducente al grado de Magister el que obtuve en julio de 2018 luego de defender mi tesis en Ordenamiento territorial.']

Details: ['Cynthia Irusta', 'IT Recruiter Freelance LATAM / Talent Sourcer/ Estudiante Lic Psicología', 'Córdoba, Córdoba, Argentina']
About:
['¡Hola! ¿Cómo estás? ¡Bienvenido/a a mi Perfil! 😊🙂
Te cuento sobre mi: 

Porque decidí estudiar la Licenciatura en Psicología: 

📚 Estudio la Licenciatura en Psicología, me parece una disciplina apasionante mi interés es ayudar a las personas y dar herramientas, me encuentro muy feliz con la carrera que elegí.

⚡También soy Tech Recruiter freelance trabajando para varias consultoras, me encanta y apasiona el mundo de la selección de personal,como selectora es muy lindo poder marcar la diferencia desde mi lugar haciendo la selección más humana, más empatíca dando feedback que es una instancia de aprendizaje para la mejora en la búsqueda de empleo, disfruto mucho potenciar el talento de las personas que puedan brillar, ayudarlos a encontrar su empleo anhelado,aprendo constantemente en mi labor diaria. Me encanta conectar personas con oportunidades laborales y acompañarlos en el proceso. También soy consciente del impacto que podemos generar en la vida de las personas, por eso para mí es importante que desde el primer contacto hasta la instancia de entrevista, tengan una experiencia agradable. 🙌🤩

🚀Me encuentro en la búsqueda de un nuevo desafío laboral, cómo Tech Recruiter/Talent Sourcer.Soy madre de un bebito llamado Michel, busco esa primera oportunidad en una empresa donde pueda demostrar mi talento, también estoy abierta a escuchar oportunidades laborales en modalidad contractor o relocation.
Me encantaria trabajar en entornos laborales dónde prime la buena onda, el aprendizaje sea constante, dónde no falten las sonrisas, se pueda crecer junto a un equipo dinámico, flexible y sobre todo humano.


🤓 Soy autodidacta,simpática
autogestionable,proactiva,sociable, divertida,soy de las personas que le importa formar vínculos que aporten valor.

¿Que es lo que me diferencia?
Sigo todo el tiempo capacitándome y aprendiendo.
También estudio inglés nivel: Pre intermedio 💫

Details: ['MAURICIO ANDRADE VERGARA', 'Socio en Andrade Leiva Abogados', 'Gran Santiago, Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile']
About:
['Abogado egresado de la Facultad de Derecho de la Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile. Master of Laws in International Law, Investments, Trade and Arbitration (Universidad de Heidelberg) y Magíster en Derecho Internacional, Inversiones y Comercio (Universidad de Chile); Diplomado en Asuntos Regulatorios de Productos Farmacéuticos, Cosméticos y Productos Biológicos (Universidad de Chile); Diplomado en Gestión de Negocios (Universidad de Chile); Diplomado en Mediación (Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile); y Diplomado en Litigación y Nuevos Procedimientos (Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile).

En el ejercicio profesional se ha desempeñado como abogado en la Superintendencia de Salud y en la Superintendencia de Casinos de Juego, y en asesorías corporativas, administrativas, comerciales, judiciales, civiles, laborales, regulatorias y de seguridad social.

Es miembro de la nómina de árbitros de la I. Corte de Apelaciones de San Miguel y de la I. Corte de Apelaciones de Santiago.

En el ámbito académico ha sido expositor en el IX Curso-Taller de la Organización Panamericana de la Salud sobre Legislación de Salud y Marco Regulatorio del Acceso a la Salud; en el Diplomado en Asuntos Regulatorios de Productos Farmacéuticos, Cosméticos y Productos Biológicos, de la Facultad de Ciencias Químicas y Farmacéuticas de la Universidad de Chile; y en el Diplomado en Gestión Legal de la Empresa, de la Facultad de Economía y Negocios de la Universidad de Chile.

Además, es coautor del libro "Sumario Sanitario: Precedentes Administrativos" publicado por la Editorial Legal Publishing/Thomson Reuters.']

About:
['QUÉ HAGO: Me dedico a desarrollar personas para transformar el mundo, Lo hago desde mis roles como Docente, Ejecutivo de Recursos Humanos, Psicólogo, Life Coach y Trainer en PNL. 

PORQUÉ FUNCIONA: He pasado más de 12 años liderando equipos en áreas de Recursos Humanos, cuento con más de 500 horas de experiencia realizando sesiones de Coaching y PNL dedicadas a potenciar a mis asesorados para alcanzar sus metas. Es la unión de estos factores la que marca la diferencia, la que me lleva a ser la clase de docente que soy, la que me lleva a entender mejor a mis clientes y me permite junto a ellos buscar a través planes estratégicos claros el logro de sus objetivos.

CÓMO FUNCIONA: El primer paso para iniciar tu transformación personal o la de tu equipo es que agendemos una reunión de 30 minutos para que podamos discutir las metas que buscas alcanzar y los retos que estas conllevan. Esta reunión será una poderosa oportunidad para encontrar que es aquello que viene impidiendo el logro de tus objetivos.

¿LISTO PARA CONVERSAR?
Contáctame para que agendemos una reunión ya sea para realizar una consultoría en Recursos Humanos como también para iniciar un proceso de Coaching con PNL.
Email: Pacussichjurgen@gmail.com.

Details: ['Yanina Cunza Vasquez', 'Gerente de RRHH en Smurfit Kappa', 'Perú']
About:
['¿Quién soy?
Peruana orgullosa de la geografía y cultura de mi país. Profesional en Gestión del Talento Humano, más de 10 años experiencia laboral que me han permitido desarrollar competencias para fortalecerme como persona y profesional.

Observadora y crítica del comportamiento de las personas, buscando conocer los puntos iniciales que determinan las acciones que realizamos. Dominio en los procesos de reclutamiento, selección, capacitación, gestión del clima laboral, gestión de personas, gestión de nóminas y procesos de desvinculación.

Líder de equipos mejorando el desempeño de los mismos, motivadora de buenas prácticas para generar un adecuado ambiente laboral fortaleciendo las relaciones interpersonales; interesada por escuchar, entender y ayudar a quienes requieran mejorar su conducta, su gestión o sus procesos. Persistente con mis objetivos y sueños.

Logré realizar una línea de carrera profesional interesante en la compañía donde ingresé como practicante, en base a mis resultados me confiaron en el 2013 la responsabilidad del área de RRHH, de dos plantas de producción, cuya población fue de 300 colaboradores. Con mérito a mi desempeño para el 2015 se me brinda la responsabilidad de liderar el área con la posición de Jefe de RRHH, con un equipo maravilloso, que me permitió seguir aprendiendo e impulsando mi mejor desempeño.

Me gusta divertirme, bailar, disfrutar de cada experiencia que tengo la oportunidad de vivir, viajar y simplemente ayudar a los demás.']

Details: ['Pablo Ladron de Guevara H 📍 GPS del Dinero', 'Nuevos ingresos en 40 días hasta con 15 nuevas herramientas de inversión, yo te enseño / Guía en Inversiones y Finanzas', 'Perú']
About:
['En Noviembre 2018 llegó el momento en que tomé el camino de la calidad de vida, del control de mi tiempo y de la libertad financiera: renuncié totalmente a trabajar y me declaré #JubiladoaLos40 años. 
Lo que busco ahora es:

1) Mediante mi taller #GPSdelDinero llegar a las personas que SE ATREVAN sin excusas a mejorar todos sus resultados financieros.

2) Crear soluciones específicas sobre Finanzas Personales a empresas u organizaciones que necesiten ofrecer un servicio diferenciado de alto impacto para sus trabajadores o clientes.

3) Prospectar nuevas oportunidades de inversión, probarlas y luego compartir las exitosas a mis seguidores.

4) Constante formación y actualización con especialistas en Finanzas Personales e inversiones, para luego difundir el conocimiento en mi comunidad.']

Details: ['Carlos Arenaza Cam', 'Dirección de Negocios | Dirección de Empresas Familiares | Dirección Retail', 'Perú']
About:
['Mi propósito es la generación de valor, liderando organizaciones que sean capaces de crear un entorno competitivo, y de confianza con todos los stakeholders, buscando construir el bienestar común que permita un mejor futuro para todos.

Tengo más de 20 años de experiencia profesional, y de ellos, 14 años de experiencia en la industria retail del Perú en áreas comerciales, operaciones y negocios, de las principales Cadenas de Centros Comerciales y retailers líderes. Con formación académica en Marketing Empresarial, Administración de Empresa y MBA en la Université du Québec à Montréal.

Dentro de mi experiencia profesional he desempeñado funciones comerciales en sectores de educación (Organización San Ignacio de Loyola), consumo masivo (MG Rocsa) y retail (Grupo Yes, Mall Plaza, Urbanova, Real Plaza y Live Entertainment). A la fecha, soy Gerente Retail en Phantom, cadena peruana líder, especializada en videojuegos y home entertainment.

En el último año, ha cursado programas de especialización en Directorios de Empresas Familiares (PAD – Universidad de Piura), Programa de Certificación para Gerente General (Centrum), Habilidades Digitales (Kurios) y el Programa de Alta Dirección - CEO en la Escuela de Negocios de la Universidad del Pacífico. Con afiliación vigente en la Sociedad Nacional de Industrias.

Soy promotor de la sostenibilidad, del trabajo en equipo, de la cultura con propósito y de la innovación continua. Habilidad para liderar retos, situaciones de crisis y procesos de cambio, con capacidad negociadora y pensamiento digital. Con visión estratégica para capitalizar oportunidades.']

Details: ['Patricia Chafloque', 'Gerente Comercial de Rimac Seguros y Co-founder de Securex | Hago que tu negocio experimente crecimiento a través de un equipo comercial empoderado | Gestión Comercial | Gestión de personas | Equipos de alto impacto', 'Perú']
About:
['Detrás de toda organización que crece hay personas empoderadas, con un performance continuo y lideradas por alguien que les transmite una visión y les impulsa en su día a día para transformarlas en un equipo de alto rendimiento. A mí me apasiona ser esa persona.

Creo fielmente que es necesario llegar al corazón y mente de las personas para ayudarlas a crecer, desde un enfoque muy genuino. Detrás de todo gran profesional, hay una gran persona.

¿Quieres que tu equipo comience a crecer? Sígueme para que te enteres cómo.

Si tienes alguna duda, escríbeme.

Correo: patriciachafloquetello@gmail.com']

Soy..

Daniel Blass Tejada
Coach de Ventas - Mentoring Comercial']

Details: ['Oscar Carbajal Parra', 'Líder Comercial | Planificación | Ventas | Marketing | Sales Leader | Canal Digital | B2B | B2C | CRM | Generando nuevos negocios para el crecimiento de las empresas', 'Perú']
About:
['Hola soy Oscar, ejecutivo con más de 10 años de experiencia liderando las áreas de ventas, marketing y planificación comercial en empresas de sectores como consumo masivo, telecomunicaciones, automotriz y transporte. Soy titulado en Ingeniería Industrial con especialización en marketing y ventas y Magíster en Administración de Empresas.

Mi amplia experiencia, me ha vuelto experto en la creación y desarrollo de canales de venta presenciales y digitales, incrementando la facturación de los canales asignados, superando las metas comerciales exigidas, así como creando e implementando proyectos comerciales, a través de herramientas de venta com CRM, Role Play, uso de analytics e inteligencia de mercado.

Si buscas un profesional con habilidad para trabajar en equipo y liderarlo, enfocando todos sus recursos al logro e incluso superación de los objetivos; siempre optimizando e innovando con herramientas tecnológicas hasta en la metodología de ventas, con el objetivo de generar nuevos negocios, incrementar la cartera de clientes, además de fidelizarlos pues son nuestra razón de ser; no dudes en contactarme.

973-923-202
oscar.carbajal@pucp.edu.pe']

Details: ['Paul Rivera', 'Business Development Manager / Sales & Commercial / B2B & B2C', 'Perú']
About:
['Soy un convencido que los procesos de gestión comercial y de ventas son más que solo eso, son un punto de convergencia entre el espíritu de una organización que busca ayudar y aliviar la carga de necesidades en las personas, potenciando sus equipos de trabajo de manera profesional y personal para que visualicen y empaticen con las necesidades que existen. Vender es la ciencia de encontrar las necesidades donde no las hay y el arte de generar seguridad en la elección.
Con más de 20 años desempeñándome en diversos cargos comerciales y ventas, soy una persona que disfruta interactuar con las personas, construir equipos, planificar e implementar estrategias comerciales son mi pasión. Avanzar con energía y tener un rumbo claro, con vocación de servicio, empatía, respeto e integridad, han marcado todo este ciclo de aprendizajes, el tomar riesgos, disfrutar la vida, pasar tiempo en familia y hacer deporte son actividades importantes en mi vida, porque al final de todo, el tiempo también tiene un límite y todo tiene un momento.

Details: ['Yancarlo Junchaya P.', 'Lider Comercial | Desarrollo de Canales | Camiones | Retail | B2B | B2C | Automotriz | Maquinaria | Especialista en generar un impacto real sobre el negocio | Ventas | Desarrollo de Concesionarios', 'Perú']
About:
['¿Porqué empresas que utilizan las mismas estrategias obtienen resultados diferentes: unos mejores que otros?
Haber nacido en el ambiente automotriz, y el haber heredado de mi padre como generar confianza a los clientes, ha hecho que hoy tenga muchas personas y familias satisfechas. Tengo mas de 13 años en el rubro Automotriz y provengo de una familia con experiencia de negocios propios en post venta y comercialización.

Administrador de Negocios especializado en expandir mercados aportando así una continuidad sostenible en el crecimiento económico de las empresas, mediante estrategias tradicionales y digitales, que ayuden a predecir información a través del Big Data y extraer indicadores que puedan ser útiles para la toma de decisiones.

Acerca de mi:
✔️Soy creativo y encuentro inspiración en lugares insospechados, organizado, lealtad, liderazgo y perseverante como las más relevantes. En mis tiempos libres investigo técnicas de preparación de arqueros (Fútbol) Tengo una preciosa familia, una hija maravillosa que la tuvimos después de 10 años de esfuerzo, perseverancia y constancia y sabemos que Dios nos hablo de su amor y nos la envió; mi esposa, mi compañera inseparable quienes son mi fuente de energía al empezar y terminar el día.

✔️Soy un ex futbolista profesional cuya constancia fue mi mayor atributo para lograr importantes objetivos y reconocimientos en el deporte, paralelo a ello mi trayectoria laboral se incrementaba logrando incursionar en diferentes sectores como agro industria, Gubernamental, Bancario, Textil,

✔️Tras una trayectoria laboral exitosa en los sectores antes mencionados siempre en el área de Back Office, decido incursionar en el rubro automotriz por la cual no era un sector ajeno a mi, ya que venia de una familia donde teníamos experiencia en este negocio, liderado por mi Padre quien laboro en la FORD MOTOR COMPANY, entre las décadas de los 50 y 60.

✔️Luego de liderar diferentes áreas de back office en el rubro automotriz (Comercio exterior, Logística, Administración, Finanzas) incursiono en el front oficce comercial alcanzado rápidamente importantes logros, ello se debió a un mix de experiencia en este sector, conocimiento desde el negocio familiar y conocimiento desde el back office (Sentido de urgencia de los clientes en lo administrativo) cuyo resultado se transforma hoy en empatía (Ponerme en los zapatos de los clientes).

yancarlo.junchaya@gmail.com
📱986 121 761 /956 834 633']

['MBA, Industrial Engineering. Committed to delivering profitable solutions, incentivizing sales, generating savings, reducing costs and with sustainable development. I have a high degree of responsibility, excellent skills to organize, develop, teach and learn, leading work teams, where I care about improving the capacities and abilities of each member. I also consider myself an active player who is part of the team.

If you need to talk about your business or some project, I always will be available to give my recommendations or share my experiences with you.

Details: ['Cybelle Guedes Campos', 'Advogada especialista em Reestruturação Empresarial, Recuperação Judicial e Falências.', 'Sao Paulo, São Paulo, Brasil']
About:
['Sócia do Escritório Moraes Jr. Advogados, especializado em Reestruturações Empresariais, integrante da Comissão Especial de Estudos de Recuperação Judicial e Falências da OAB-SP e membro do IBAJUD - Instituto Brasileiro de Administradores Judiciais. 
 
Tenho especialização na área de Recuperação Judicial e Falências e área Cível e Processo Civil, com atuação no segmento jurídico desde 2001.

Minha história com o Moraes Jr. Advogados teve início em 2005, quando atuei como estagiária e, após concluir a graduação, foi promovida ao cargo de advogada coordenadora. Em 2012, após outras experiências em escritórios de advocacia e departamento jurídico de empresas, retornei ao Moraes Jr. Advogados como sócia.

Após um processo de reestruturação da equipe e da área administrativa, reavaliamos nossa estratégia de negócio, estabelecendo como foco de crescimento o segmento de Reestruturação de Empresas, incluindo Recuperação Judicial e Extrajudicial, bem como Planejamento Societário e Holding.']

About:
["I am a qualified Chartered Accountant from The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI). I am presently employed as Finance Manager and possess extensive experience in delivering proven results through management accounting and financial reporting (Balance Sheet, P&L and Cash Flow Statement) within time and as per country specific reporting standards.

A servant leader, adept at budgeting & financial forecasting and guiding staff to achieve and maximize organization's EBITDA margins. I also identify robust internal control needs in setting up accounting policies and procedures in order to help mitigate financial risks and increase bottom-line margins.

Key Competencies:
- Leadership and Team Support
- Project Profitability Analysis
- Negotiation and Problem Solving
- Business Process Automation
- Financial Reporting & Variance Analysis
- IFRS Accounting
- Strategic Planning & Policy Development
- Performance Optimization

Technologies:
- MS O365 Suite (Advanced Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, Word, SharePoint), SAP, Tally ERP, Xero, Quickbooks, Google Sheets, CRM

Key Achievements:
+ Developed strong accounting policies and procedures which led to cut fixed costs by >5% YoY
+ Prepared financial forecasts of >AED 300+ Million with maximum accuracy in spreadsheets
+ Single-handedly managed budgets of more than 5+ projects worth AED 3+ Million each every quarter
+ Reduced MIS Reporting timeline from 30+ days to 15 days and further to 7 days
+ Reduced average collection period of debtors from 62 days to 38 days
+ Implemented VAT and filing of tax returns timely
+ Planned and implemented cash to accrual accounting policy within 21 days of joining
+ Trained and managed a team of 4+ accountants and finance executives
+ Executed long term contracts with 3+ vendors to achieve rebate and increase revenue by 7%
+ Invented payment process cycles to 2 times a month to reduce the time and efforts of payment processing.
+ Established signed contract policy with advance collection terms to increase working capital by 30%
+ Focused on increasing EBITDA % by increasing management fees and adding mark-up on every cost.

Currently, I’m seeking an opportunity in the area of senior-level finance role where I can contribute my leadership and financial management skills towards achieving company goals and future growth. #ONO"]

Details: ['CA Jithu Koshy', "Skilling & Placing India's Future Generation @ Virohan | General Manager - Finance & Accounts | Phoenix - Rise from the Ashes 🔥 |", 'Cochin, Kerala, India']
About:
["Until 17, I had a great life. At 18, I did not have money to pay my college fees & dropped out. At 22, I became a CA. From then on, never looked back. Education is Liberation & my mission is to make a positive impact in the life of fellow human beings through the medium of Education. Anything studies, education, career-related, personal finance management - reach out friends. Always happy to have a conversation. 

Coming to work life, 6 years of audit life in 2 incredible firms - Varma & Varma Chartered accountants and KPMG, followed by another 6 years with an amazing telecom company in Qatar - the Incumbent operator - Ooredoo, 2.5 years at Vivartana Ventures India Private Limited building the finance team, strategy and product development in the 0 to 1 journey and now with Virohan as the finance business partner in the blitzscaling journey. My profession is Finance, the heart is that of an entrepreneur & passion is education. Happy to be working at the intersection of the three from April 2019.

Yet to figure out where we want to settle down for the long term - GCC / India / First world country. As a family, in the process of figuring out.

Always believed in the power of numbers to speak & in the power of businesses with social responsibility. We come on earth and we go - while we are here, it is our duty to live responsibly.

I am active on Linkedin now, building my connections, learning from seniors, widening horizons & perspectives, and even if there is an Iota of chance for me to contribute to someone else's life, doing that with my limited resources & capabilities.

Note: I have reserved 10 pm IST Monday to Friday for any of you who would like to bounce off with me on any aspects such as Financial Independence, Personal growth hack strategies, Time Management, Professional growth & choices, side hustles, and so on. Feel free to book a slot at www.phoenixjithu.com and I will be there to talk to you and share my limited experience and knowledge."]

Details: ['Jogi Gujral CMA (USA), CFM, CSCA, FCA (India), FCMA (India)', 'Senior Corporate Controller | Taxation | MIS | Treasury | Financial Statements |SAP | Manufacturing | Fortune 500', 'Toronto, Ontario, Canadá']
About:
['I am a global financial controller with more than 25 years of senior leadership experience, having worked extensively as a finance and accounting head in four continents and travelled to 27 countries. I love working with driven senior management teams to make things happen. 

I have successfully managed five full life cycle implementations with Fortune 500 clients in Canada, UAE and South Asia within a 365/AX, Oracle and SAP FICO manufacturing environment across all modules and through all phases of the Project.

I have extensive knowledge of best manufacturing practices and principals with Fortune 500 U.S. MNC’s. My current job includes documentation regarding risks, issues with configurations, ERP implementations, reports, and on-going support. Successfully re-engineered business processes by implementing an efficient new ERP system, mitigating risk.

Extensive knowledge of D365/AX Finance modules and functional capabilities. Cross-functional knowledge of D365/AX and functional capabilities in PowerBI, Supply Chain (Trade & Logistics), Manufacturing, Project Costing, Accounting, Reporting, Tax, Finance, Financial Planning and Analysis, and Service Management.

Performed Canadian SOX and Internal Controls in Canadian Company and SOX on U.S. operations.

I am CFM (Certified Financial Manager), CSCA (Certified in Strategy and Competitive Analysis), CMA (USA), FCA (India), Fellow Member of The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India and FCMA (India) Fellow Member of The Institute of Cost Accountants of India. Additionally, I have completed Masters in Business Administration from IIM (Bangalore, India), one of the Premium Business Schools of South Asia.
I have cleared Capstone1, 2, and Day 1 of CFE conducted by CPA Canada. I currently do not reside in Ontario, and am not governed by CPA Ontario.']

Details: ['María Jesús Pimentel Finschi', 'Abogada Laboral en Deloitte Chile', 'Chile']
About:
['¡Hola Red! quise variar un poco el perfil y hacerlo más cercano a quiénes me visitan.

Soy Abogado de la Universidad Adolfo Ibáñez de Santiago. Cuento con 5 años de experiencia laboral.
Mi mayor pasión en el derecho, es el derecho del trabajo, tanto en su dimensión individual como colectiva.
Tengo experiencia tanto en Consultoría como en Juicios Laborales. Siendo mi mayor expertisse la Consultoría. A lo largo de mi carrera he asesorado empresas de diversos giros y tamaños, comerciales, multinacionales, hoteleras, automotoras, empresas del servicio acuícola que son todo un mundo aparte.

Por otro lado, vinculado al derecho del trabajo, también cuento con experiencia en Migraciones, regulaciones en el país, en especial, cuando se traen extranjeros invitados a un proyecto a Chile o a vivir por un tiempo.

Me encanta lo que hago, vibro con él, por eso me encanta hacer clases también. Desde la Universidad he sido ayudante del ramo, participé activamente en la editorial de GlosaLaboral, y he hecho capacitaciones en distintas materias, tanto a Clientes como en la UDD (a la carrera de Nutrición "Alimentación Laboral") y cursos de capacitación en una OTEC, siendo mi tema la Ley de Accidentes del Trabajo y Enfermedades Profesionales (Ley 16.744) y Comités Paritarios de Higiene y Seguridad.

En cuanto a especializaciones cuento con un curso de Reforma Laboral (Ley 20.940; 2017) y soy Magíster en Derecho Laboral y Seguridad Social, UAI (2021).

Cualquier duda o consulta, cuenten conmigo. ¡Los leo!']

Details: ['Claudio Pimentel', 'Magíster en Derecho Constitucional y Desarrollador', 'Gran Santiago, Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile']
About:
['Creo en la libertad que las personas tienen para elegir cómo dirigir sus decisiones en los diversos aspectos de su vida. Por eso, represento sus pretensiones en los tribunales como abogado litigante, a su vez, enseño las decisiones de dichos tribunales en programas de pre y postgrado como profesor jornada y profesor asistente en Derecho, respectivamente.
Por lo que puedo ver, el reconocimiento de los Derechos Humanos en el siglo XXI es un requisito imprescindible para acceder a la justicia. Por esa razón, realicé una Maestría en Derecho Constitucional con mención en Derecho Procesal Constitucional en la Universidad de Talca, programa del cual estoy titulado, con distinción máxima en la defensa de la tesis de postgrado.
Vivo en Chile y mis intereses incluyen la programación como nuevo lenguaje, el litigio sobre la protección de los derechos de las personas en la sociedad del siglo XXI y el aprendizaje significativo y funcional, también me interesa la defensa de los derechos de los animales y la práctica de actividades deportivas.
En 2020 fui galardonado por la revista Acquisition International (AI) con el premio anual que distingue las voces de las empresas de vanguardia en todo el mundo.
Tengo el compromiso de brindar atención legal y resolver los asuntos encargados con esmero. Puedes referir tu caso en el sitio web de mi empresa, agendar una hora para resolver dudas legales de forma remota o presencial en mi oficina en Santiago.']

Details: ['Carlos Moises Hidalgo Gonzalez', 'Administrador Empresa // Asesoría y Consultoría a Empresas', 'Chile']
About:
['El cliente como objetivo en todo tipo de negocios; En la banca tuve la oportunidad de atender a todo el segmento de clientes del banco, las personas, las pymes, grandes empresas y corporaciones. Siendo una de las experiencias más importantes de mi carrera, cuando fui designado negociador itinerante durante la crisis económica del 1982. Me correspondió negociar, recuperar y mejorar posiciones crediticias y de garantías en casi todo el espectro industrial del país. Por el éxito de esta misión, fui enviado a España, por la Alta Dirección del Banco, a mi regreso ocupe el cargo de Gerente de Banca Corporativa, despues de pasar por Director de diferentes oficinas del país, Director Regional y Director de la Casa Matriz.
En el retail obtuve la experiencia de la logistica, el negocio operacional, la actividad comercial y el negocio del area inmobiliaria, actividades que han sido grandes aportes a mi vida profesional.
En este sector el esfuerzo fue mayor al tratar, siempre y en cada momento, de tener, retener y aumentar el consumo de nuestros clientes el la sala de venta. Tal cual lo hacíamos en la banca; Ofrecer todos y cada uno de los servicios en la tabla de oferta, para nuestra clientela.
La gran diferencia es que en la banca trabajamos con una mercadería mucho más sensible. El Dinero.
Cree en el retail, un sistema único de Fidelización de Clientes, que cosecho grandes resultados
Me ofrecieron, muchas veces, por las características personales, de ser asertivo, gran capacidad persuasiva, facilidad de oratoria y empatía con los interlocutores, ser candidato a parlamentario para el Congreso Nacional. "Fuí, competí y gane". Ejercí desde año 2002 al 2006.
Desde Mayo del 2006, me radique en España. Donde me dedique a la Asesoría y Consultoría Estratégica y de Operaciones, en los sectores de hostelería, retail y recuperación de activos de empresas auxiliares del sector financiero.
Hoy en Chile a contar de Enero del 2018. Asesorando en el sector retail y otros']

Details: ['Anthony J James', 'CEO Innovación y crecimiento global, haga clic en SEGUIR para conocer las últimas innovaciones globales', 'Sídney, Nueva Gales del Sur, Australia']
About:
['I believe that, when people are learning, they are growing. I’m on a quest to make excellence a part of those lives that I come in contact with. For me, every day is an opportunity to make the world that I live and work in a better, more creative and more compassionate place.

I’m a lifelong optimist who believes that no mountain is too high to climb, every obstacle has a solution attached to it and even the most far-reaching dreams can be realised with imagination, creativity and resilience. My passion is to help the people I come in contact with turn a great idea into a breakthrough experience that can be seen, touched and felt globally.

I see that obstacles are just opportunities in disguise. Always looking over the next horizon, I am constantly seeking a chance to be a part of that one innovation that can change the way people experience the world.

For nearly 30 years, on four continents, I have helped organisations of all types and sizes learn the art of leadership, influence and technology disruption. My clients learn how to utilise entrepreneurial vision, creative thinking and innovation strategies to become experts in digital, sales, marketing, and brand loyalty. From new startups to big brands, I have helped teams get smarter while the business grows.

Before joining the global consulting ranks with IBM, CSC, Creata and Fujitsu, I was a graphic artist, animator and creative director- all skills that have served me well as I developed my consulting skills. At Trinity Consulting Services, I have been an expert in the commercialisation of new ideas and the global growth of existing businesses in APAC, Europe/EMEA and Australia.

As one of LinkedIn’s most awarded influencers, recognised with a 2018 LinkedIn Power Profile - #1 in Marketing & Advertising and 2018 LinkedIn Top Voice (Australia) and Most Influential Agency Voice in Asia Pacific in 2016.

If you want to talk about business growth, strategic direction, creative thinking and operational leadership, I’d love to talk!']
Courses: ['Advanced Presentation Skills', 'Cross-Cultural Contract Negotation', 'International Business Management & Contract Negotiation']

Details: ['Nia Mahesa', 'Managing Partner at NMCo. Law Firm', 'Yakarta, DKI Jakarta, Indonesia']
About:
["Ms. Mahesa is the founder of NMCo. Law Firm. She received her Master in Business Law from the University of Pelita Harapan in 2015 with Magna Cum Laude predicate and her Bachelor of Law from the Catholic University of Atma Jaya in 2009.

Her early career in law started in 2009 at Suyanto Simalango Patria, a boutique law firm in Jakarta, where she was appointed to handle Banking, Telecommunication, and Real Estate clients.

Her passion for Real Estate led her to pursue her career with Ciputra Group from 2011 to 2014, where she was involved in their 1st Sub Holding as Corporate Legal Manager. She was responsible for the real estate broker, Century 21 Indonesia. She had the chance to develop 21 Property Academy, a law property academy, to knowledge the group’s marketing on the property transactions. She was actively contributing to AREBI (Asosiasi Real Estat Broker Indonesia) as one of their Code of Conduct committees.

A new challenge came to her when she was offered the position of Group Head of Legal of Astra Property Group (a subsidiary of Astra International Tbk) from 2014 to 2019.

She was involved in developing their commercial and residential projects such as Menara Astra, Anandamaya Residences, Asya, and Arumaya. As a property developer, she participated in REI (Real Estate Indonesia). She is well knowledgeable in land acquisition, strata title and certification, also inland, landed house, and building permits.

Aside from Ms. Mahesa's expertise in Real Estate, she is well experienced in General Corporate, Trade, Commercial Litigation, Restructuring, Insolvency, Bankruptcy Litigation, Intellectual Property, Medical Law, and Family Law in the Firm.

Ms. Mahesa is a current bar member of PERADI (Perhimpunan Advokat Indonesia) and actively participates in the bar’s activities."]

Details: ['Ramanuj Mukherjee', 'Built iPleaders, a blawg with 2 mil/m users & bootstrapped LawSikho to $3m+ revenue. Currently building an army of freelancers & paralegals from Asia & Africa to disrupt the 300 billion US legal industry.', 'Delhi, India']
About:
["I have reached the maximum number of connections I can have on LinkedIn. Follow me here for my best insights: https://twitter.com/law_ninja 

Are you trying to build your law practice? Download for free and read this first: https://lawsikho.com/book/flying-start/

Do you want to work with a tier 1 law firm? I have this resource for you: https://lawsikho.com/book/blueprint/index.html

I started online businesses in the legal domain like iPleaders.in, LawSikho.com, and Superlawyer.in and have been building them up over the last decade.

iPleaders blog was started way back in 2009, from our college and since then it has become one of the largest legal blogs in the world that cover legal issues relevant to common people. As of Nov 2018, we attract 1 million unique readers per month and growing very fast.

I also started lawsikho.com which is the leading online legal learning platform, offering courses with live online classes, lots of exercises, mentorship and hands on training to hundreds of lawyers, law students and executives every month.

I have started and shut down many businesses too, such as cliklawyer. You start succeeding when you're not afraid to fail again.

Looking for meaningful volunteering opportunities and platforms to connect with like minded people. If I can help you in any way, do not hesitate to drop me a line."]

Details: ['Ashish Mehta', 'Founder & CVO, Ethos Legal Alliance || Banking Law & Financial Institutions Practice Enthusiast || At Heart A Litigation Lawyer || Lifelong Learner', 'Mumbai, Maharashtra, India']
About:
['I started my independent Disputes Resolution Practice in 2010 and went on to establish Ethos Legal Alliance (ELA), a young, Corporate & Commercial Disputes Resolution Law Firm in 2018, backed by my diverse, intense and wide experience in Disputes Resolution Practice in Mumbai. I have 13 years of experience at the Bar. 

I have handled plethora of cases, before various Courts, Tribunals, Statutory & Regulatory Authorities, Commissions & Forums, which individually add up to a rich exposure in the entire spectrum of Disputes Resolution Practice. As a lead Counsel, to my credit, I have 25 reported Judgments in various Law Journals. I am enrolled as the Panel Counsel for the Union of India before the Bombay High Court since the past four years and in addition, I was the Special Public Prosecutor for the Income Tax Department, Mumbai Region, entrusted with launching Prosecutions. I represent Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) before District & Sessions Courts.

I have worked closely with various Central Ministries/Authorities/Departments, having advised and appeared for them before different Courts and Tribunals in path breaking and benchmark setting matters, involving complex and intricate questions of law.

8 Practice Areas, ELA focuses on, amongst others:-

Disputes Resolution
Insolvency & Restructuring
Banking & Finance
White Collar Crimes
Real Estate
Environment
Direct Tax
IP Litigation

ELA advises and represents leading Corporates, Banks, NBFC's, Business Houses, SME Clients, Government of India, Authorities & Prosecuting Agencies. We have a strength of 08 Associates (and rapidly growing), who are assigned specific practice wise Courts to attend and appear.

We are on a Mission to establish ELA as "The Most Preferred Mid-Size Corporate Disputes Resolution Law Firm" in India by 2025.

Appointed as Special Public Prosecutor for SEBI, Mumbai in October 2019']
Courses: ['Post Graduate Diploma In Alternative Disputes Resolution From NALSAR']

Details: ['Dayana Barría M.', 'Abogado. Socia Directora TH Partners. Socia en Red MAD · Mujeres en Alta Dirección. Directora Aceleradora de Negocios Mujeres Empresarias', 'Chile']
About:
['Abogado. 20 años de experiencia, 15 de ellos dedicados a asesorar a grandes y medianas empresas en asuntos de negocios, tributarios y corporativos, acompañándolas en los procesos de reorganizaciones y de implementaciones de estructuras jurídicas que les permitan optimizar su situación de carga impositiva y de operaciones y administración. 

Después de haber asesorado a empresas tales como Indumotora, Falabella, Constructora Siena, Sacyr Concesiones, Inmobiliaria Manquehue, entre otras compañías nacionales y extranjeras, he descubierto en el mundo del emprendimiento mi pasión. Hoy, soy una firme convencida de que una cancha pareja es lo que los emprendedores necesitan para crecer y llegar más lejos, y que esa cancha pareja se logra a partir de mayor y mejor información.

Miembro del Directorio Estratégico de la Aceleradora de Mujeres Empresarias y mentora de diversos emprendimientos en etapa temprana.

Egresada del programa BOW (Board of Women) desarrollado en conjunto por Mujeres Empresarias y la Universidad Diego Portales; socia de Red MAD (Red Mujeres en la Alta Dirección) y egresada del programa PDE (Programa Desarrollo de Empresarios) de ESE Business School de la Universidad de Los Andes.

En el ámbito académico, profesora del módulo de Planificación Tributaria del Magíster de Gestión y Planificación Tributaria de la Universidad de Santiago de Chile.']

Details: ['Sajai Singh', 'Chair, IBA Technology Law Committee', 'Bengaluru, Karnataka, India']
About:
['Chair of the Corporate Commercial Practice at JSA, along with leading the Technology, Media & Telecommunication Practice.

Undertake transactional work with a focus on representing emerging Technology companies in areas of inbound investments into India, Venture Capital & Private Equity investments, Joint Ventures, strategic alliances and Mergers & Acquisitions.

For Venture Funding & Private Equity transactions, represented both funds and investee companies.

Represented clients in a cross section of industries including Media, Communication, Entertainment and BPOs (Business Process Outsourcing).

Assisted many international businesses and funds to funnel investments into India. These clients include established and high technology companies, internet start-ups, connectivity specialists, e-commerce ventures, conversion technology and technology based entertainment industries.

Conducting two professional skills development courses at the National Law School of India University in Bangalore - one on Negotiation Skills and another on Transactional Skills for lawyers.

Acting as the Vice-President of ITech Law (http://www.itechlaw.org/officials.htm), the International Technology Lawyers Association. India representative for ABA International, along with being the Co-Chair of the India Committee of ABA SIL. Chair of the International Sub-committee of the PE / VC Committee of the ABA Section of Business Law. Actively involved with TiE and ABA (American Bar Association) globally, and often speak at international events.
