Details: ['Hemant Batra (Hekbat)', 'Lawyer | Public Policy Advocate | Author | Special TV Host - Guest Anchor | Arbitrator | Counsel | Faculty |', 'Delhi, India']
About:
['Hemant Batra is a globally reputed constitutional, corporate, commercial, and public policy lawyer and counsel with nearly 30 years of experience. He is also a mediator, arbitrator, author, writer, and speaker. He was enrolled as an Advocate with the Delhi Bar Council in 1991. 

He joined the legal profession in 1991 as a litigation lawyer. Thereafter, with the progression of economic liberalisation in India, he ventured into a whole time law chamber practice by predominantly rendering expert legal opinions and undertaking legal documentation on complex international and domestic legal/public-policy issues. Currently, he is an independent arguing counsel.

He is the elected vice-president of SAARCLAW (South Asian Association for Regional cooperation in law), a regional apex body of SAARC established in 1990, and being the longest serving Secretary General of SAARCLAW i.e. almost 10 years in the past. SAARC is an inter-governmental diplomatic body of 8 South Asian nations. He had been associated with various projects of UNDP, UNAIDS, UNESCAP, and ADB. His profile is independently covered by Wikipedia, the largest and most popular multilingual online encyclopedia and reference work.

He was awarded prestigious Mahatma Gandhi Seva Medal by the Gandhi Global Foundation for effectively connecting legal communities of the SAARC nations. He is a mentor at several prestigious schools of business and an elected lifetime member of the general Assembly of the Union of International Association (UIA), a research institute and documentation centre, based in Brussels. The UIA has consultative status with ECOSOC and associate status with UNESCO. He is a co-founder of an international law and policy think-tank, Goeman Bind HTO.

He is a distinguished writer with seven diverse books to his authorship. His two latest books on `Due Diligence: In Business & Asset Acquisition’ and `Mediation: Legitimacy & Practice’ have been published by a leading law publisher, Eastern Book Company. He wrote his first book in 2004 titled SAARC.

He is a visiting guest speaker at various international universities and institutions. Until 2020, he has spoken as a speaker at more than 175 international conferences, seminars, and workshops on varied topics of commercial importance. He has travelled extensively around the world including Australia, Austria, Bhutan, Czech Republic, Germany, Holland, Hungary, Indonesia, Kuwait, Mauritius, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, Philippines, Russia, South Korea, Sri Lanka, Thailand, UAE, UK, US, Vietnam and more.']

Details: ['Francesco Rampone', 'IP/TMT Lawyer', 'Milán, Lombardía, Italia']
About:
['Francesco is a knowledgeable lawyer well versed in Intellectual Property, Information Technology and Data Protection Law with over 20 years’ experience in the legal profession. His clients range from start-ups to large high ranked companies to which he provides assistance to protect their assets and support business growth. 
Francesco is a recognized proficient on IP/TMT with a profound knowledge of legal framework in many innovative and cutting-edge sectors. As information technology attorney Francesco usually works with engineering, IT staff, and other business units talking their jargon and easily understanding their needs and perspective.
He has written many publications and research papers and regularly writes articles on legal trends and significant Italian and European case law.
He is member of academic and teaching staff for post graduated courses and as hi-tech enthusiast he is regularly chairman and speaker in conventions on ICT topics.
He is head of the IP/IT department at La Scala Studio Legale and worked in house for some of the largest ICT companies, gaining valuable experiences of business oriented approach and cross border commercial transactions in TMT.']

Details: ['Dr. Vinod Surana', 'Successful Law Firm CEO | Accomplished Lawyer | Trusted Advisor | Effective Mediator | Mentor |', 'Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India']
About:
['Family Business Advisor, Independent Director, Conflict Management Specialist, Mediator

Listed by Lexis Nexis in “100 Legal Luminaries of India” and “Highly recommended” by Chambers & Partners for Corporate / M & A in India, I specialize in conflict resolution, deal structuring and policy advocacy.

Qualified from Madras University, Harvard University, Cornell University, London School of Economics, Indian Institutes of Management (Ahmadabad & Bangalore) and received scholarships from the governments of Germany, Japan and the United States to pursue specialized post-qualification training programs.

Sought after keynote speaker, CEO Coach, "voice of Industry", policy advocate with governments at the regional & national levels and family business succession planner cum conflict resolver.

Conferred prestigious national recognition(s) in India, achieved many firsts and accolades in public life.

Interests include aerospace and defence, alternate healing, diplomacy, mediation, meditation, organic farming, world travel and writing.

Believer in the inherent goodness of humanity and natural living for lasting peace, progress and prosperity.']

Details: ['Ritvik Lukose', 'Co-Founder and CEO - Vahura & Co-Founder and Director - Counselect', 'Bengaluru, Karnataka, India']
About:
['Ritvik Lukose, is the Co-Founder and CEO of Vahura (www.vahura.com) - the leading specialist Legal Search and Consulting firm in India. 

A graduate of the National Law School, Bangalore, Ritvik practiced corporate law at Amarchand Mangaldas, with a focus on private equity, capital markets and structured finance.

In 2007, he left the law to co-found Rainmaker (www.rainmaker.co.in), a pioneer in training and education services to the legal domain. Rainmaker, among other things, designed and ran India's first ever nation-wide bar exam for lawyers - the All India Bar Exam.

Ritvik exited Rainmaker in 2013, to lead Vahura (www.vahura.com) - the leading legal & governance recruitment and consulting firm in India. Vahura's purpose is "To help lawyers do good work", and with that aim, Vahura helps lawyers and legal services providers, grow organically and inorganically through a range of services and products.

Ritvik is also Co-Founder and Director of Counselect (www.counselect.com), a pioneering provider of legal secondment services in the region.

Ritvik is on the Advisory Board of the Centre for Advanced Mediation Practice (http://www.campmediation.in/) and training to be a commercial mediator. As a lawyer and entrepreneur, Ritvik is a passionate advocate of mediation as a means of resolving issues swiftly and effectively, with parties in control of the process and solutions.

He blogs irregularly on Entrepreneurship, Work and Life at http://ritviklukose.wordpress.com and tweets occasionally @ritviklukose

Specialties: Talent Management, Consulting, Business Strategy, Recruitment, Mediation and Corporate Legal Advisory']

I have also successfully curated and delivered training programs for organizations like ICICI Bank and Advaita Legal.

Currently a significant part of my day goes in helping startups go through with their legal formalities on one hand and guiding my students on the industry requirements on the other.']

Details: ['Vinh (Richard)', 'Founder and Managing Partner at Asia Legal', 'Vietnam']
About:
['OVERVIEW

Vinh (Richard) is a Founder and Managing Partner of Asia Legal. 

Prior to setting up Asia Legal, Vinh was former Head of M&A and Foreign Investment Department of a long-established law firm specializing in legal and advisory services and dispute resolution in Vietnam, with offices in both Vietnam and Singapore.

Vinh also spent several years working for a well-known business law firm, headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, in a role of Head of Hanoi Office, where he advised on foreign investment, corporate & commercial matters, cross-border mergers & acquisitions, corporate restructurings, property & construction and dispute resolution.

Before taking on the role of the Head of Hanoi Office of the above business law firm, Vinh served for several years as the Senior Manager and Assistant to a major local law firm based in Hanoi. There he managed, supervised and coordinated the legal team. In that role, he provided legal advice in the areas of international trade, cross-border mergers & acquisition, employment and labour, incorporation and foreign direct investment. He also developed and refined the strategic direction and implementation of legal consultancy services.

Vinh is an Accredited Mediator of Center for Effective Dispute Resolution (UK), and Vietnam International Commercial Mediation Center, Associate of Chartered Institute of Arbitrators (UK), and Arbitrator of Southern Trade Arbitrator Centre. He is also a Visiting Lecturer of Judicial Academy of Vietnam, a body established under the Ministry of Justice to provide professional training for judges, lawyers, bailiffs, notaries, and other officials in Vietnam.

Vinh is currently a candidate of the LLM in International Trade and Economic Law from University of the West of England (UK).']

Details: ['Eran Kahana', 'Cybersecurity, AI and IP Attorney | Fellow, Stanford Law School | Co-Author: The Law of Artificial Intelligence & Smart Machines', 'Mineápolis, Minnesota, Estados Unidos']
About:
["I am a cybersecurity and intellectual property lawyer as well as a Fellow at Stanford Law School and a member of the Advisory Board of Stanford Law School’s Stanford Artificial Intelligence & Law Society.

In my practice, I counsel clients on a wide variety of matters related to cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, privacy, technology law, trademarks, patents, and copyright issues. I also serve in a variety of cybersecurity thought-leadership roles and work closely with the FBI, Department of Justice, Secret Service, and colleagues from the private and academic sectors to set, promote, and sustain cybersecurity best practices.

At Stanford Law School, I write and lecture on the intersect between law and artificial intelligence and am a frequent speaker at Stanford's annual Digital Economy Best Practices Conference. I have been cited in Oxford University Professor Marcus Du Satoy’s book The Creativity Code: Art and Innovation in the Age of AI and also interviewed on artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, privacy, and technology law by Bloomberg Law, BBC, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation (CBC) radio, KABC radio, Minnesota Public Radio, Twin Cities Business magazine, Star Tribune, TheStreet.com, Quartz magazine, and Stanford University Radio, KZSU FM.

I am also a certified martial arts instructor in Bujinkan Budo Taijutsu and an avid motorcyclist."]

Details: ['Sam Miller', 'Founder The Fine Art Ledger ; Corporate Finance Attorney at Rimon P.C.', 'Los Ángeles, California, Estados Unidos']
About:
['I am a corporate and commercial transactional attorney, and a member of Rimon P.C.’s corporate finance team, based in its Los Angeles office. 

My specific focus is blockchain, NFT’s and fine art. 

I am also founder of The Fine Art Ledger, the blockchain fine art platform that works to connect physical works of art to NFT’s.

As intensively involved in the building and development of The Fine Art Ledger, I have specific experience in the operation and functionality of smart contracts, and the interface with and structure of NFT’s , including all associated metadata content, constructs and storage.

I also work with token driven and asset based blockchain businesses, helping them deal with securities, money transmitter, money laundering and other regulatory requirements, contractual relationships, as well as gearing their platforms to deal with industry requirements and concerns.

I am licensed to practice law in, and have practiced in California, England and in South Africa, and have both extensive in-house and law firm experience.


M&A is also a core feature of my practice, advising on transactions for businesses in multiple US states and international jurisdictions

I have advised on corporate deals, commercial contracts and general corporate matters for clients in a range of countries over the last seventeen years, including England, Spain, France, Turkey, Lithuania, Latvia, United Arab Emirates, Israel, South Africa, Hong Kong, South Korea and the United States, with core industry involvement in the metals, technology, fine art and transportation sectors.


I have also had particular experience in supply and distribution, working with manufacturers, suppliers and distributors on international and domestic supply-chain transactions.

Before returning to private practice, I established and led the legal department of Kloeckner Metals Corporation, the third largest metals service center in North America, comprising Namasco Corporation, Macsteel Service Centers USA and other subsidiaries, and prior to that I worked as an M&A solicitor in the leading City of London firm Berwin Leighton Paisner LLP.']

Details: ['Zabi Yaqeen', 'Founder and President at Muuvment. Member of the Law Society of Ontario.', 'Toronto, Ontario, Canadá']
About:
['Since 2014, my work has been dedicated to using media and technology to raise awareness of pressing social problems and building campaigns that generate measurable impact. Prior to that, I worked for 8 years as a commercial litigator and entertainment lawyer. 

In my role at Wishing Step Pictures, I produced and co-wrote the feature documentary film The Price of Cheap, which we started in August, 2014 and is being released in 2021. The film examines the hidden lives of the forced labourers who make our clothes. We follow their fight for justice against corruption, inequality and the fashion industry. I volunteer as duty counsel at Artists’ Legal Advice Services and as executive director of The Abolish Foundation.

I am a founder and the president of Muuvment.com, a technology platform that helps employees lead healthier and more purposeful lives. We soft-launched in January, 2021 and over the coming months, we look forward to sharing how we’ve reimagined supporting health and purpose through unique interactive experiences and actions that generate measurable impact. Over the next couple of years, we plan to make our media and tech tools available for free to the public.

In 2021, me and my colleagues at Muuvment are going to continue to focus on our keystone habit which is to consider how we can help individuals and organizations generate meaningful and measurable impact in every decision we make.']

Details: ['Amr Wageeh (Amr M. M. Elsayed) LLM, ICDL, MCP, GC Powerlist, CEFDI.', 'FDI Expert | Public Policy | Foreign Trade | Government Affairs | Governance| Procurement | Contracts Management| Economic Zones', 'Kuwait']
About:
['Amr is a General Counsel & FDI policy adviser with a demonstrated history of working in the investment management industry, he has more than 20 years of extensive legal experience in Corporates, he has a fundamental understanding of the issues confronting global Corporations and Governments. 

His cross-border legal and business experience has been recognised globally by The Legal500 for helping to drive business growth with a focus on the GCC and Middle East markets.

The Doing Business Team in The World Bank Group appreciated his knowledge and expertise as one of the Contributors who participate in the development of the Doing Business indicators.

Amr has in-depth knowledge and expertise in “FDI”, Corporate Governance, Offset Program and Economic Zones. Skilled in Negotiation, Operations Management, Securities, Document Drafting, and Business Intelligence. Strong legal professional with a Master of Laws – LLM focused on Private law - Investments & International Trade.']

Supportive of government’s vision to create a friendly environment to attract foreign investments in Kuwait. Huge asset to the organization and legal fraternity.'], ['Moataz yousef CMA, CFC,CIA', 'Director at Deloitte', 'Mr. Amr Wageeh is a rare example of an effective , helpfu and knowledgablsl Senior Consultant. His hands-on approach to the FDI law. offset obligations, freeezones...etc exemplifies his competence as an accomplished expertise. He is always willing to help when needed and is a professional who personifies the qualities of a team worker and a great leader. During my work at KDIPA as both an employee and also as a client, I got the notice of Mr. Amr as a very committed, self-driven and versatile team partner. His ability to handle multiple projects and still be focused was unlike any I’ve seen before. he always knows the better way of achieving results and there is no problem that Mr. Amr couldn’t solve it. A very useful resource person to say the least.'], ['شريف محمد بدر', 'محامي بالنقض .. مقدم محتوى قانوني على اليوتيوب على قناة شريف محمد بدر - Lawtuber 1', 'مستشار قانوني بارع خبرته كبيرة في مجال جذب الاستثمارات الأجنبية والتنافسية و تحسين بيئة الأعمال وتقييم المشاريع ومنح المزايا وخدمة المستثمرين و الأنشطة الترويجية والمتابعة والتدقيق ومتابعة المشاريع الاستثمارية والعمل الحكومي بشكل عام'], ['Rami Alhadhrami', 'Tax Partner at BDO Kuwait', 'It is always a pleasure to work with Amr. He has been very supportive to foreign companies and other stakeholders involved in Kuwait FDI. Amr has valuable expertise in FDI laws, offset programs and Economic Zones in the region. He is a highly-talented, results-oriented professional capable of providing proactive solutions to complex issues. His consistent dedication and enthusiasm to Kuwait Vision 2035 and FDI in Kuwait is inspiring.'], ['Mohamed Afifi', 'Legal Director at IHS Towers', 'I have been working with Amr for over 9 years now in different capacities. Our business relationship started back when Amr used to be the legal counsel of the Kuwait Foreign Investment Bureau, thereafter he moved to KDIPA and I had several other positions in different law firms and organizations. During that time, Amr has always been an extremely competent, hard-working, and intelligent person. His work ethics are exceptional and he always demonstrates a high level of knowledge and experience as to many aspects of the legal field especially foreign investments. Amr is a highly educated person and such solid academic background together with his in-depth knowledge and experience in the foreign investments area equipped him with the necessary tools to assist both his organizations as well as its clients on their related matters however complex their goal may be – in a legally compliant manner with their commercial goal in mind, and assisting as well with implementation however that implementation may be challenging. Amr will no doubt find success in his endeavors and would be a benefit to any organization.'], ['Ranjith Pathiyil', 'Tax Attorney', 'Not many people can handle market trade offs as Amr Wageeh can - he is always very patient, solutions oriented and mentoring the young professionals to deal with the challenging situations. He is also very kind and easy to deal with, which made our relationship smooth and have an open door culture. What a great professional to have as a mentor'], ['bader alhammad', 'Specialist in public financial affairs and financial control', 'حققت هيئة الاستثمار المباشر منذ انشاءها إنجازات واضحة وملموسة نتيجة للتأسيس القانوني والفني المميز لها، والذي كان له الأثر الواضح على نجاح بيئة العمل بالكويت، وقد شجعت البنية القانونية المناسبة للهيئة العديد من الشركات العالمية للدخول والمشاركة بالمشاريع الاقتصادية الكويتية. حيث ساهمت عناصر الخبرة في فريق العمل الذي شكّل خصيصا لأعداد اللائحة التنفيذية لقانون انشاء هيئة تشجيع الاستثمار المباشر في نجاح الهيئة، هذا الفريق الذي تضمّن أعضاء ذو خبرة احترافية في مجال القانون وعلى وجه التحديد المتعلقة بالتشريعات التجارية والاستثمار. وقد تشرفت شخصيا بصفتي عضو في هذا الفريق بتلك العناصر والتي كان من ضمنهم الأستاذ / عمرو وجيه المستشار في هيئة تشجيع الاستثمار المباشر، حيث كان لوجوده ضمن الفريق المعني قيمة مضافة حقيقية لفريق العمل، كما أسهم بشكل واضح بخبرته السابقة في هذا المجال بالمساهمة مع أعضاء الفريق المختصين بإخراج اللائحة التنفيذية للقانون بهذه الصورة المشرّفة. كل التوفيق والنجاح للأستاذ / عمرو في عمله متمنيا منه مزيدا من الإنجازات والاضافات القيمة في هذا المجال، كما اوصي به كل المهتمين بالتشريعات الكويتية المتعلقة بتشجيع الاستثمار المباشر، وذلك لما يتمتع به خبرات واسعة في هذا المجال ، وقدرات عالية في نقل المعرفة في هذا الشأن من التشريعات .'], ['Mahmoud Diab', 'مدير الادارة القانونية في مجموعة المطوع القابضة .. مؤسس مكتب الراية للمحاماة الكويت .. أدمن رابطة القانونيين في الكويت', 'عمرو وجيه نموذج رائع و مجرد عندما يعمل .. قادر دائما ان يفعل .. يعرف كيف يصل لهدفه .. اضافة قوية وفعالة لاي مكان ينتمي اليه .. ذو نظرة ثاقبة ورأي سديد .. نسأل الله له التوفيق دائما .'], ['Muhammad O. Sarwy', 'Business Lawyer', 'I had the chance to work very closely with Amr on a couple of projects where he has clearly demonstrated a unique package of skills that you seldom find in one counsel! Amr is well equipped with the comprehensive knowledge of the local laws and regulations yet has a practical and international outlook for business solutions. What I enjoyed most is how he could manage the balance for being that pleasant, motivating, helpful with others and; punctuate, organized and hard-worker with his own assignments. It was pleasure to cooperate with Amr and I hope our paths may cross again.'], ['Karl Hopkins', 'Partner, Global Chief Security Officer', "Amr Wageeh acted as the legal coordinator for Jamal & Jamal Law and was in charge of promoting and supporting the business in Kuwait. Amr's contributions fostered the efficiency of consultancy relationship, then established, between Jamal Al Shehab and the firms I was at, Dewey & LeBoeuf (2010-2011); and Dentons (2012) respectively. In the time I have known him, Mr. Wageeh has consistently been a strong professional, capable of taking control of big projects and executing them to the fullest. Mr. Wageeh is a very thorough and competent professional with exceptional skills for analytical thinking, research, language and communication and he is well experienced in the practice of international law. Mr. Wageeh's strong sense of organization helped him to always gain the upper-hand in the competitive business environment. Mr. Wageeh is talented at both big picture ideas and executing the small details. I am pleased to recommend Mr. Wageeh as a prominent legal counsel, I believe his work will not only meet but exceed the expectations for his respective position."], ['Tarek Yehya', 'Partner at Meysan Partners', 'While advising the Kuwait Direct Investment Promotion Authority on the feasibility study for the establishment of three special economic zones in Kuwait, I had the chance to work closely with Amr Wageeh, a senior legal advisor at KDIPA who was responsible for the review of our deliverables in the project. The project required access to in-depth knowledge and experience in respect of strategic, physical, legal and operational framework for special economic zones as well as it involved a significant stream of benchmarking exercises that needed a great deal of focus, dedication, engagement and mastering of the various work streams in the project aiming for the delivery and submission of sensible and practical views and recommendations. Throughout the course of our work on the project that spanned over a period of 18 months, Amr was a great person to work with and was also an important player in all the legal deliverables. Amr provided relentless guidance through the various regulatory, Governmental and legal matters relying on a solid legal knowledge and a vast track record in dealing with Government institutions through debating, negotiating and closing some of the most valuable agreements among Kuwaiti Government institutions.'], ['Khaled Talaat', 'Country General Manager at IBM Kuwait', 'Amr Wageeh was one of the most dedicated professionals through his work at KDIPA; he supported us in the establishment of IBM Entity in Kuwait. His technical experience and loyalty makes him to view solutions instead of problems. No matter how complex the problem is, he will always come up with a brilliant, elegant, and cost-effective solution. Working with him is a signature of success. I wish Amr all the success in his career.'], ['Sama B. Hassan', 'Regional Offset Director - Middle East & Turkey', 'There are not enough words to fully describe the great work accomplished by Amr. He was diligent, prompt and very helpful in guiding us through the legalities required. He dedicated valuable time, patience and displayed superb skills throughout our journey with KDIPA.'], ['Jens Bauer (private account)', 'Senior Director International Services at General Dynamics European Land Systems', 'Amr Wageeh is an expert in Industrial Participation at Kuwait Direct Investment Promotion Agency. Next to excellent skills and know-how Amr is absolutely professional in negotiations and focused on solutions and success. His impressive personality in combination with his entrepreneurial management attitude makes him to an outstanding leader.'], ['Dr. Bilal Sandid', 'مستشار قانوني- استاذ جامعي- متخصص بالدراسات القانونية والتدريب', 'ليس من الصعوبة الاضاءة على ما يتميز به المستشار القانوني عمرو وجيه وما تكتنزه سيرته المهنية من تميّز... عمرو وجيه، ذلك القانوني الموهوب والدؤوب الذي التقيته منذ أكثر من عقد من الزمن ولفت نظري اليه بحسه العلمي، بطموحه المشروع، بخطواته المدروسة، وبشغفه بالعمل وسعيه للتقدم والاستزادة من المعارف ذات الصلة بالمهام الموكلة اليه. لقد عاصرته باحثاً قانونياً في القطاع الخاص وزاملته مستشاراً في القطاع العام، وفي كلا الموقعين بقي عمرو الانسان نفسه، بتواضعه وهدوئه ودماثة اخلاقه ؛ لكن عمرو القانوني قد ازداد خبرة متميزة واتسع في الأفق وتعمق في التفكير. المستشار عمرو وجيه هو الآن ركن رئيسي من أركان الرأي القانوني في مجال الاستثمار والعقود المتصلة بذلك. صفاته الشخصية ساعدته في حسن التصرف مع المستثمرين وفهم طبيعتهم واشتراطاتهم، كما أن ملكته القانونية ومعارفه العلمية مكنته من التعامل بنجاح فائق مع كافة المشاكل والصعاب والمسؤوليات التي بادر بالتصدي لها او اوكل اليه حللتها... ولا ننسى خبرته العملية الواسعة في مجال الشركات التجارية وفي مجال التعامل مع الجهات الحكومية ذات الصلة. لقد شاركت المستشار القانوني عمرو وجيه في عدد من اللجان التي كلفت بصياغة بعض التشريعات واللوائح - ومنها قانون تشجيع الاستثمار المباشر، وقانون هيئة اسواق المال وغيرهما... وفي كل مرة كان رأيه سديدا ومشاركته قيمة ومساهمته مجدية. لن اتناول في كلمتي القصيرة هذه سيرته المهنية الزاخرة ولا تحصيله العلمي المميز، فذلك تتكفل به الصفحة المتخصصة، ولكن من غير المنصف الا أمرّ سريعا على مواصفاته المهنية والتي سأحاول تلخيصها ببعض الكلمات والعبارات المختصرة وهي : الجدية- الانضباط- العلم والتعلّم- التجربة المتراكمة- والخبرة القانونية والتنفيذية المميزة. لا تمكنني هذه العجالة من اعطاء الاستاذ عمرو وجيه حقه بالتعليق على تجربته العلمية والعملية ولكني كفيل بأن من يتعامل او سيتعامل معه سيجد فيما كتبته من سطور قليلة قبس خافت مما يستحقه من ضوء.'], ['Quentin des Cressonnières', 'Executive Managing Director - Abu Dhabi PV2 Energy Company at EDF Renouvelables', 'Amr has been supporting our AZN 1 Project in Kuwait by providing very good advise and follow up on every topic. He has strong legal expertise which is very useful when entering new country. Thank you!'], ['Ali H. Khalil', 'Chief Executive Officer at Kuwait Financial Centre - Markaz', 'I had the privilege of working with Amr while being a member of the committee that drafted the executive regulations for law 116 pertaining to the establishment of Kuwait Direct Investment Promotion Authority. Details: ['Sean Hayes', 'Top 100 Rated Int’l Lawyer. 20+ yes. experience. Led Dispute Resolution Law Firm of Year. Former Korean government officer, professor, columnist & U.S. Senate staffer. Proactive & Street-Smart Int’l Business Professional', 'Nueva York, Nueva York, Estados Unidos']
About:
["Sean, a top rated international lawyer, is engaged in legal and business projects in New York, Korea, China, Hong Kong and Southeast Asia. Sean Hayes is the first non-Korean lawyer (NY Attorney) employed by the Korean Courts and one of the first non-Koreans to be a full-time regular member of a Korean law faculty. He spends his time between New York, Manila, HK and Seoul.

Sean managed a team that was ranked the Dispute Resolution Firm of the Year by two different publications. Sean is ranked a Top 100 Lawyer and LawAsia has rated Sean as one of only two non-Korean lawyers as a Leading Attorney. He is, also, regularly rated a Top Attorney in Arbitration, IP, Franchising, Dispute Resolution and Corporate Compliance for various legal rating services and is regularly quoted by the Wall Street Journal, NY Times and other leading news sources.

Sean is known, for his aggressive advocacy, proactivity, strategic approach to the legal and business challenges and candid NY-style street-smart advice.

Sean is, also, one of a few legal professionals that has experience managing non-consulting companies. He worked as an interim General Manager/HR Manager for Oil & Gas, New Tech, Pharmaceutical, Franchise and Manufacturing companies.

Sean regularly appears in and is quoted by international media organizations including the NY Times, Wall Street Journal and international law journals.

Sean is a New York Bar Member
Sean is member of the Int'l Bar Association."]

Details: ['Mishi Choudhary, Esq.', 'Technology, Privacy, Open Source, Policy, Law, CIPP/E, CIPP/US|Founder SFLC.in', 'Nueva York, Nueva York, Estados Unidos']
About:
["I solve problems for clients building new products and businesses in the U.S. and in India. Quickly learn new technologies and their challenges. Passionate privacy and Open Source professional working with tech companies to build privacy products and create privacy policies that protect user data. I use this knowledge to help policy makers make better regulation and policies to build Pro-Privacy IT for Humanity.

Found and built a legal services organization working on law, technology and policy, SFLC.in while running a law practice.

Recognized globally as a thought leader in technology policy matters including Intermediary Liability, Privacy, Data Protection, Copyright, Patents, Network Neutrality and Open Source Strategy.

Gallup's strengths Finder: Strategic, Individualization, Activator, Significance, Command.

Fifteen years of experience in broad base of substantive law relating to high technology companies and experience with technology policy issues, regulatory and self-regulatory regimes. Open Source Software licensing and compliance, Information Technology Laws, Data Protection laws (including state and federal consumer protection and privacy laws, GDPR, CCPA and other global laws), Privacy, Cybersecurity, Artificial Intelligence , FinTech, software patents, export control compliance, domain names, ethics, internal investigations and employee relations issues, developing internal policies, Codes of Conduct, employee agreements.
Practice includes North American and Asian legal systems. I am the only lawyer in the world simultaneously to appear on briefs in the US and Indian Supreme Courts in the same Term.

In 2010, I found SFLC.in, a legal services organization to advance digital rights through strategic litigation, policy and advocacy in India. SFLC.in has now become the premier non-profit organization representing the rights of Internet users in India. It is instrumental in public-policy making on all issues of law,technology and policy. Built an extensive litigation practice that includes several landmark judgments on internet free speech, privacy, encryption, right to information. Extensive experience managing policy campaigns and strategic outreach with stakeholders including managing strategic outreach initiatives and policy campaigns to advance the values and interests of general public. A regular speaker on the global conference circuit, I write regularly in national and international publications.

Admitted to Practice in India and New York."]

Skills: ['Corporate Law', 'Trademarks', 'Copyright Law', 'Strategy', 'Mergers & Acquisitions', 'Patents', 'Trade Secrets', 'Privacy Law', 'Strategic Partnerships', 'Joint Ventures', 'Litigation', 'Contract Negotiation', 'Patent Litigation', 'Legal Research', 'Leadership', 'Due Diligence', 'Mergers', 'Software Licensing']
Recommendations: [['I.P. Park', 'President of LG Sciencepark, Chairman of LG Group Technology Council', "Alyssa is a world class business-focused attorney, intellectual property expert and business executive, and I am very pleased to have worked with her closely during my tenure at Harman as CTO. Alyssa literally built from scratch Harman’s intellectual property strategy, and is credited to have dramatically increased the IP portfolio in quantity and in quality. Furthermore, she created and executed the IP monetization strategy for Harman, which has now become a significant technology and brand licensing business for Harman. This was possible because of her ability to work with and lead the technology teams, product teams and the business teams. While at Harman, I witnessed Alyssa put a focus on aligning intellectual property with the business and credit her with the following: 1) developing cross-divisional and cross-functional patent committees which resulted in increasing the patent portfolio by over 150%; 2) creating with the Lifestyle Audio division a technology and brand licensing program that generated additional revenue for Harman's business; 3) implementing a patent portfolio optimizing strategy that resulted in higher visibility of Harman's technological diversity and breadth across the company; 4) incorporating intellectual property reviews and strategies into Harman's business and M&A transactions; and 5) overseeing and managing a strategy for handling complex IP litigation. Alyssa also showcased her leadership ability at Harman by serving as a role model to her team of over 20 attorneys, paralegals and IP specialists, serving as a co-sponsor of the Harman Women's Network and being chosen as one of a select group of Harman executives to work on developing new business initiatives at the company. In summary, Alyssa is a super talented, experienced, and extremely dedicated executive who always delivers top results. She is also a very pleasant and fun person to be around. I enthusiastically recommend her for any legal, technology, business related executive position."], ['Caroline Wong', "Chief Strategy Officer at Cobalt | Humans of InfoSec Podcast | Security Metrics, A Beginner's Guide | The PtaaS Book", "The work that the global information security team does with vendor partners is typically custom development where a lot of smart folks are turning a great idea into reality. Alyssa provided my team with specific guidance on complex contracts often involving intellectual property and investment and ownership issues. I've always felt comfortable trusting her to alert my team to issues that we may not have caught ourselves, and provide great recommendations based on what we're trying to accomplish."], ['Natasha Gurevich', 'Chief Procurement Officer at Nike', "Alyssa and I have developed from scratch and completed 27 agreements in 7 months, and I can confidently attest that Alyssa is one of the strongest attorneys I've ever worked with. Her outstanding knowledge of contractual law and amazingly creative mind allowed eBay team to frame our business aspirations in a formal language benefiting both our team and our suppliers. Alyssa is a brilliant negotiator - calm, persistent, knowing when to insist and when to let go. She sees solutions where others see problems, and that makes her uniquely positioned not only as an attorney but as a strategic thinker and operational lead. I'd recommend Alyssa to any organization looking for a Senior attorney with the strong understanding of Strategy and Business Development."], ['Ted Gizewski', 'Zoom Deputy General Counsel', 'Alyssa is a highly skilled attorney and excellent negotiator. She provides pragmatic, business-oriented legal advice, and helps her clients develop creative solutions to complex business and legal issues. Alyssa is highly adept at defining and executing on legal strategies that support her clients, while building mutually beneficial customer relationships.'], ['Alida Rincon', 'Principal', 'Alyssa develops outstanding relationships with internal clients. She is service and relationship oriented and provides top notch legal advice. She demonstrates dedication and hard work for every project. Alyssa has extensive experience in multiple areas, including deep knowlege of open source issues and all aspects of contract negotiation.'], ['Becky Scott', 'Division Director - Communications, Publishing, Research at The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints', 'I have had the pleasure of working with Alyssa for the past year or so at eBay Inc. We worked together on a few different projects that including extensive contract writing, negotiation and planning for third party vendors. Alyssa exhibited nothing but the utmost in professionalism at all times during all of our interactions. Her negotiation abilities are profound in that she understands the value of silence and the timing of a properly place comment. She moves fluidly from legal counsel jargon to patiently explaining complex legal concepts in laymans terms. She understands who she is representing and puts in a great deal of effort to ensure she is representing them accurately. Addtiionally, Alyssa has extensive knowledge in her field. I cannot not write a recommendation strong enough to amply communicate her level of expertise in the legal realm. In addition to extraordinary professionalism she has a human touch. She is approachable and forges valuable friendships as she gets the job done. Alyssa will be a great addition to any company and eBay was lucky to have her on their side.'], ['Andrew Miller', 'Public Company Board Member and Audit Committee Chair; Accomplished Technology Executive', "Alyssa was one of the strongest members of Autodesk's legal team and her tremendous competence and commitment made her a pleasure to work with as well as someone you could count on to deliver great results. She possessed a unique ability to balance business risks and objectives and legal risks and concerns, enabling her to function as a great legal partner. She is principled with a strong and balanced point of view."]]

Recommendations: [['Rich R.', 'Privacy Counsel', 'Ulrika is a dedicated, resourceful, key member of our Privacy & Compliance team. In addition to being a recognized data protection expert, Ulrika has very effectively driven compliance and policy development and training in all of our European businesses. Her review and communications on legal and regulatory changes are incisive and thorough. I unreservedly recommend Ulrika for her skills, knowledge, and ability to make a positive difference.'], ['Karim Antonio Lesina', 'Executive Vice President, Chief External Affairs Officer at Millicom (Tigo)', 'I would like to recommend Ulrika because she is a great expert on European privacy legal and regulatory issues with an extensive network both to business and public affairs. I met her at the AmCham EU in Brussels and she was great in exchanging information and working together to develop better positions on privacy related issues.'], ['Carsten Hess', 'Partner at Avisa Partners, Founder, CEO at CHESSEUROPE srl, Co-Founder & Business Angel @GrandChess Arts & Entertainment', 'Ulrika is a great expert on European privacy legal and regulatory issues with an extensive network both to business and public affairs. I met her through shared work in AmCham EU in Brussels and had extremely useful exchanges of information and discussions on developments in EU data privacy policy-making after having joined Deutsche Post DHL.'], ['Bojana Bellamy', 'President, Centre for Information Policy Leadership at Hunton & Williams LLP', "Ulrika has a great combination of opertaional data privacy experience and policy work. She knows her way around Brussels and was a great firghter for GE BCR's approval"], ['Simon Hampton', 'Founder, Technology Policy Advocates', "Ulrika is both passionate and knowledgeable about privacy. She's driven industry associations and clearly enjoys the respect of the regulators. I've always enjoyed working with her."], ['Sandy Merber', "Counsel, Int'l Trade Regulation and Sourcing at General Electric", "Ulrika's in-depth knowledge of data privacy laws and the legislative process, combined with her good judgment and gracious manner make her an effective lawyer and policy advocate. She is equally comfortable working within the EU and globally."], ['Jim Jordan (JD, CRCM, CIPP)', 'Retired from Fiserv, Inc. as Assistant General Counsel - Regulatory Policy', 'I highly recommend Ulrika. She is bright, diligent, responsible, knowledgeable and skilled in diplomacy. She did an excellent job in guiding GE through the thicket of EU privacy laws, among other laws and regulations. She also rendered invaluable assistance in our persuasion of EU data protection authorities to approve our Binding Corporate Rules for cross-border data transfer.'], ['James Lovegrove', 'Director at Red Hat EMEA', "I very much enjoyed working with Ulrika. She's hard working, conscientious, friendly and has a very impressive grasp of issues impacting the technology sector."]]

Details: ['Robert Bond', 'Solicitor, Notary Public and Compliance & Ethics Professional', 'Sidmouth, Inglaterra, Reino Unido']
About:
['Robert Bond is a Solicitor and Notary Public and a Certified Compliance & Ethics Professional. He is a legal expert and author in the fields of data protection, information security and cyber risks, e-commerce, computer games and technology and has specialised in data protection & information security law since 1983. His publications include Practical Commercial Precedents (Chapter W) and Negotiating Software Contracts. 

Robert is a Fellow of the Society of Advanced Legal Studies, a Companion of the British Computer Society, an Honorary Member of the Institute of Export. He is a Freeman of the City of London and a Liveryman of both the City of London Solicitors’ Livery Company as well as the Worshipful Company of Stationers and Newspaper Makers.

He is a Director and Honorary Solicitor of the City Livery Club, a Director and Council Member of The Notaries' Society, Company Secretary & Trustee of South West Grid for Learning, President and Board Member of the Society for Corporate Compliance & Ethics and the Health Care Compliance Association, Head of the Examination Board for the Practitioner Certificate in Data Protection, Chairman of the Governance Board of the Data Protection Network, a founder member of the UN Global Pulse Expert Group on Governance of Data and AI, and an Ambassador for Privacy by Design.

Robert is Listed as a Leading Individual in Legal 500 for Data Protection where he is described as "astounding" and in Band 1 for Data Protection in Chambers UK 2022 and where sources praise him his"very level-headed and pragmatic approach," as well as his "long-term experience and insight," explaining that he "delivers a commercially practical solution." He regularly advises leading multinationals on data protection, drawing on additional experience in technology and IP issues.

He is named in the DataIQ 2021 Data 100, named in the National Law Journal's list of 50 Governance Risk & Compliance Trailblazers, listed in "Who's Who Legal: Thought Leaders - Global Elite 2021", recognised for Information Technology in the Client Choice awards 2020, named as a Thought Leader in " Who's Who of Data Protection Lawyers 2020" and listed in "Best Lawyers in UK in the practice area of Information Technology Law 2022".']

Recommendations: [['Chuck Barry', 'A Senior Legal Counsel for Coloplast Corp. Global Commercial & Government Contracts Counsel for multiple business units', "Robert's command of EU Data Protection regulatory requirements and how to apply these by practical, simple explanations and policies and business practices that business executives can understand has been an exceptional art and skill that Proto Labs, Inc. benefited from when I retained Robert and his team to assist my team and the company in updating our data protection and cookies policies and business practices in 2014. In addition, his kindness and generosity in sharing what he knows so well made working with Robert a real enjoyable experience."], ['Monica Almeida', 'Dual qualified international privacy lawyer', 'I was fortunate to work with Robert during my time at Speechly Bircham. Robert is a great partner to work with, extremely supportive and very effectively mentoring his associates. His knowledge of all data protection, privacy and data security issues is extraordinary, and his experience with assisting clients in complex issues allows for commercially sensitive solutions for multijurisdictional data protection concerns.'], ['Chuck Barry', 'A Senior Legal Counsel for Coloplast Corp. Global Commercial & Government Contracts Counsel for multiple business units', 'Robert is a superb, trusted advisor and "architect" on EU, U.S., and other states data protection regulatory compliance requirements, policies, processes and systems with which companies can strive to improve their risk profiles in volatile times. In 2014, Robert and his team of associates did an excellent job in assisting my contracts and legal team in cost effectively planning and instituting uptodate data protection and "Cookies" policies and other guidance for current business needs and as strong foundation for future developments, when I served as the director of contracts and compliance at Proto Labs, Inc. (Proto Labs is a $163M quick-turn prototype and 3D printing manufacturer in Minneapolis, MN.) We appreciated very much Robert\'s and his associates capable and very responsive legal support and practical business insights to enhance our implementation of current data protection policies and practices. Chuck Barry'], ['Jack McLaren-Stewart', 'Co-Founder at Saorsa Group', 'I have had the pleasure of working with Robert in multiple capacities and to call him an expert in his field is a massive understatement. Not only is his knowledge of all things Data Protection-related unparalleled, but his willingness to share insights and advice has been hugely helpful on both a business and personal level. He continues to push boundaries in his field and I’d have absolutely no hesitation in recommending him to anyone seeking to learn more about the world of data protection, information security & cyber risk.'], ['Patrizia Bertini', 'Associate Director of Design Operations at Babylon Health', "Being in need for a professional legal advice, I've turned to Robert, knowing his outstanding reputation. I was extremely impressed by his helpfulness and have greatly appreciated his honest and sincere attitude and his highly competent and professional advices."], ['Oliver M. Habel, Dr. jur.', 'Managing partner tecLEGAL Habel RAe', 'I have worked with Robert Bond for a common client, corresponded in data protection matters, and had common legal presentations on international congresses of ITechLaw Association. Richard has a good technical understanding of the Internet, has an excellent legal knowledge in the field of Internet and law, is a fabulous speaker, and especially a very good colleague and friend, who has a broad international professional experience. I would recommend him in all Internet and data protection matters in UK. Oliver Habel, Munich, Germany'], ['Raphaël Dana', 'Partner at Dana Associés (Paris Bar) dana.law', 'I have been working and co-writing articles with Robert since 2003 on various IT/IP/Privacy-related matters, and it has always been a tremendous pleasure. Seeing him handling files involving various countries has shown me how to act as a team leader with enthusiasm and efficiency. I look forward to many more years of collaboration!'], ['Emma Bartlett', 'Partner at CM Murray LLP', "Robert's experience and knowledge in the field of information technology is invaluable to any business, particularly an international or pan European one. It is rivalled only by his great enthusiasm and tenacity to resolve issues pragmatically and get to the heart of any concern."], ['James Evans', 'Associate General Counsel', 'Robert is clearly a real expert in his field - and in particular has an unrivalled knowledge of data protection law. He also has a great understanding of law in the context of magazines and online media. I have worked with Robert for almost five years and have always found him to be very personable.'], ['Omer Tene', 'Partner, Goodwin', 'Robert is a true leader in law and technology, with decades of experience at the forefront of the profession in IP, IT, data protection and security, outsourcing and more. He has a unique grasp of the technological aspects of regulation, including issues such as RFID and biometrics. He friendly and good humored and at the same time serious and hands-on. I have worked with Robert on several projects and strongly recommend him for any legal or policy engagement.'], ['Wayne Cleghorn', 'Chief Executive Officer & Practice Director at PrivacySolved', 'Robert has developed a reputation as a trusted specialist in IT/IP/Data Protection/Privacy. His webinars and legal updating services are very good and are much-loved by a wide range of in-house counsel and information professionals. He is approachable, very knowledgeable and is very much the gentleman advisor.'], ['Peter Kinsella', 'Partner at Perkins Coie LLP', 'Robert is a very capable attorney with a wealth of experience in intellectual property and privacy matters. He provides valuable guidance, good business judgment and a deep knowledge of the law. His positive attitude and high level of ethical integrity is evident in all of his interactions.'], ['Ceylin Beyli', 'Founder & Managing Lawyer at CBL Law Office', 'I first met Robert back in 2005 in Stockholm, during European Conference of ITECHLAW (which was called "CLA" back then). \'Til date, I had the opportunity, honour and delight to benefit from his broad information and experience in data protection and IT matters, to enjoy his speechs at the mutually attended conferences and to work together in projects. He is not only a very good lawyer with extensive knowledge in his field, but also a great colleague with a delightful sense of humour.'], ['Daniel Breston', 'Retiring after 50 years in IT! Volunteer board member of ITSMFUK, FBCS, FISM, and sharing knowledge as a blogger, or via webinars or at conferences!', 'Robert was recommended by the British Computer Society as someone who could offer advice in company start-up, data protection, IP, IT law strategies both in the UK and EU. I am glad I did not disbelieve this advice 6 years ago as his guidance and patience have helped me immeasurably.'], ["Tjerk t'Sas", 'Sales Leader France & BeNeLux at DXC Technology', 'Robert is a top professional who trained and motivated my team.'], ['PETER BROWN', 'Principal at Peter Brown & Associates PLLC "BrownTechLegal" We help businesses create, implement, arbitrate and protect technology', 'Robert is one of the leading lawyers in the U.K. in the fields of data security, computer games and IT law. He has a broad international reputation among technology lawyers and their clients. Robert is a thought leader on cutting edge technology issues and is a prolific author and lecturer. The IP/IT practice group at his firm, which he helped found, is one of the most dynamic teams in this field. I would strongly recommend Robert for any project that requires insight, creativity and technicial skill.'], ['Michael Doland', 'Abogado americano', 'Knowing Robert Bond through INTA and originally through the international group of legal counsel he formed in the 1990s, the consistent feedback from every client referred to him is fantastic. A thorough knowledge of his field and a great focus on giving value to multinaitonals doing business in the EC. Great communication skills with CEO, CFO and CIO level decision makers.'], ['Julian Heathcote Hobbins', 'Legal Counsel, License Compliance at Autodesk EMEA', 'Robert is one of the best in the field, thinking laterally in a commercial manner and expertly applying the law accordingly. First class attention to our needs in the organisation - need I say more.'], ['Enric Enrich', 'Alliance Partner at Croma-Copyrait', 'I have been working with Robert for a long time and he has always been very effective in all the services provided. I strongly recommend him if you need an expert in his field!'], ['Lisa Lister', 'culture-first, better business', 'Robert is an expert in the field of IT Law and data protection. He has a wealth of experience both internationally and in the UK. In addition, and I would say most importantly, he is an extremely nice guy.']]

Details: ['Jerry Levine', 'Chief Evangelist & General Counsel at ContractPodAi®', 'Nueva York y alrededores']
About:
['#AI #Technology #Software #Data #Privacy #Lawyer #Awesome #contracts #legaltech

I've long called my practice "Awesome Law" -- because my focus is on achieving what can be done, driving results, increasing market share, and protecting & driving revenue -- and not on saying "no" and closing doors. 

Outcome-oriented, passionate, and experienced in-house attorney and legal technology evangelist, now the Chief Evangelist & General Counsel of ContractPodAi (www.contractpodai.com).


Extensive hands-on legal and business experience representing technology, internet/web, consumer product, media, and other companies across all practice areas, including contracts, transactions, corporate governance, compliance, litigation, intellectual property, licensing, privacy, employment, real estate, finance, and international law.']

Recommendations: [['Peter Connolly', 'Director, Best Practice at Splunk', "Jerry is a business-focused legal executive (GC) and 'secret' chief operating officer, he identifies and solves problems that companies (and people) don't know they had (or didn't even think they could solve), and he's also a commercial lawyer with an ability to mitigate risks, protect market share, and grow the company."], ['Kevin Haughwout', 'Product Management | Hardware | Robotics | Automation', "I've sought Jerry's advice in the past, and I was impressed by the assistance that he was able to offer. He was extremely thorough not only in his efforts to understand the situation, but also in the breadth of options that he found available for me. Without sounding too much like a television commercial, I think that Jerry is extremely talented at applying his experience in order find solutions to the problems at hand, and I am happy to recommend him."], ['William Jimroglou', 'Lead Sales Recruiter @ Spectrum. Inventor & Spokesperson', 'Jerry is an outstanding Attorney and always at the top of his game. Levine/Gerba have represented me the past few months on two separate matters and I have been extremely satisfied. The terms are reasonable, the service is even better. I would highly recommend both Jerry Levine and David Gerba.'], ['Ed Palumbo', 'Fractional Strategist & Consultant', "I had the pleasure of meeting Jerry while we were both at Weber Gallagher. It was immediately clear we shared similar passions for emerging technology, the social web, and tech culture; I knew we'd be sharing knowledge for the foreseeable future. I've learned more from my sessions with Jerry, even about my own ideas, than I could have imagined. Across industries, Jerry has a far reaching knowledge of how the web works and has the skills to apply that dynamically to a business in need of a safe, tried and true social presence. His legal background has driven him to consider every angle. You can count on that."], ['Benjamin Abo', 'Experienced International Emergency Medicine Guru', 'Jerry can be a man of many words or of few words, all depending on the appropriateness of the situation. I have known him for years and wholeheartedly trust him for so many things. A hard worker and one that delivers above and beyond. I consult him for his opinions and recommendations often and they always carry heavy weight in my book. For anything he does or you might want or need him to do, I honestly recommend him and REQUEST the opportunity to speak on his behalf.'], ['Rob Whitaker', 'Programme Delivery Manager, MBA, Certified SAFe 5 Program Consultant', 'Jerry received me upon a business trip to Japan in 2006. I found him an extremely reliable, accommodating and intuitive individual. I benefitted greatly from his understanding of the Japanese culture and, through his briefing, found that I was able to gain value from my stay by an appreciation and application of Japanese customs. Jerry is a courteous and thoughtful contact whose opinion I value largely. I recommend him as an asset to all client-focussed activity.'], ['Leah E. Capece', 'Managing Attorney at Law Office of Leah E. Capece, Esq., LLC', 'Jerry is an ambitious and talented young lawyer with a real understanding of the ins and outs of the various aspects of the legal system. Jerry has an incredible knack for relating to people and handling complex situations. Always resourceful and willing to lend a hand, I would recommend Jerry in a heartbeat!'], ['Matthew Wilson', 'Dean at Temple University Japan', 'I had the privilege of observing, teaching, and supervising Jerry Levine during his legal studies in Tokyo. Jerry was an exceptional student, and I highly recommend him to potential clients or employers. Jerry excelled in my classroom. I can attest to his strong intellect, dedication to excellence, eye for detail, and analytical insights into studying and applying the law. Outside of the classroom, I have gained much respect for Jerry over the years based on his motivation, organization, leadership skills, outgoing personality, and desire to excel.']]

However most importantly, his ethics and heart are in the right place and he can be trusted to do the right thing every time."], ['John Chivvis', 'Virtual Engagement Specialist at Texas A&M AgriLife Events', 'I have a true respect for Jon professionally and personally. In addition to being a good lawyer, I have also heard him speak on e-discovery, and he is good at that too!']]

Details: ['Máximo Patricio Flores Abalos', 'Profesor de Historia de corazón, capacitador y Diseñador Instruccional por experiencia.', 'Chile']
About:
['Tengo amplia experiencia el docencia de niños y jóvenes, además tener algunos años como docente de educación superior (20 años). Desde hace unos 15 años he tenido responsabilidad en coordinación de equipos docentes para variados proyectos, desde la producción de materiales para redes informáticas escolares hasta el desarrollo de programas a distancia y presenciales en competencias docentes, lo cual ha sido realizado para instituciones como la Universidad Internacional SEK, INACAP, INTEC, Colegio Mayor, MN Editorial, entre otras.

Durante mi permanencia en MN Editorial pude ligarme a nivel nacional con diversas comunidades escolares con la misión de brindar asistencia técnica a docentes, como también acciones de gestión cultural y marketing desde la perspectiva de la oferta editorial.

Mis objetivos son consolidar mis conocimientos y prácticas en área de la capacitación y educación de adultos, tanto al nivel de empresa y la educación superior, desde la dirección de proyectos de capacitación y el desarrollo de nuevos productos aplicando aspectos tecnológicos duros y blandos, en cuanto metodologías, como nuevas herramientas TICs.

Especialidades: Negociación, manejo de proyectos, creación de soluciones a problemas, e-learning, diseño instruccional, marketing educacional, autoaprendizaje de tecnologías, manejo de grupos, solución de conflictos, entre otros.']

Details: ['Cristian Bustos Flores', 'Profesor en Universidad San Sebastián y Jefe del Programa de Lenguaje DUOC UC', 'Concepcion, Bio Bio, Chile']
About:
['Profesor y Magister en Educación Superior. Vinculado hace 15 años como docente escolar y universitario, y con 10 años en cargos directivos en el área de educación.
Me he desempeñado en distintos ambientes educativos principalmente en gestión de procesos para la mejora de resultados. Además, me interesa la temática de Inclusión de personas en situación de discapacidad en la Educación Superior y sobre ello he podido concretar algunos proyectos e innovaciones de las cuales me siento orgulloso, pero sé que falta mucho camino por recorrer.

Todo proceso educativo debería ser cuestionado constantemente. Todo muta de acuerdo a las circunstancias, y nosotros creamos las circunstancias.

Dejo una de las citas que más me han caracterizado.

“No hay más que un camino para el progreso en la educación, como en todas las cosas humanas, y es el de la ciencia guiada por el amor. Sin ciencia, el amor es impotente; sin amor, la ciencia es destructiva.” (BERTRAND RUSSELL)']

Details: ['Luis Sujatovich', '𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐟𝐞𝐬𝐨𝐫 𝐝𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐨́𝐧 𝐒𝐨𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 | 𝐂𝐚𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐝𝐨𝐫 𝐕𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐚𝐥 | 𝐃𝐨𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐨', 'Argentina']
About:
['𝐃𝐨𝐜𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐨 𝐞𝐧 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐨́𝐧 𝐒𝐨𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 con formación en 𝐃𝐨𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐨 y especializado en 𝐄𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐨́𝐧 y 𝐍𝐮𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐬 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐢́𝐚𝐬, entre ellas la utilización de la metodología 𝐆𝐚𝐦𝐦𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧. Me acompaña un bagaje de +𝟏𝟎 𝐚𝐧̃𝐨𝐬 dictando clases en diversas 𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐬 tanto 𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐝𝐚𝐬 como 𝐩𝐮́𝐛𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐬 y en 𝐔𝐓𝐄𝐋, universidad online número 1 de México. Durante todos mis años de docencia he brindado clases en carreras de 𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐨́𝐧 𝐝𝐨𝐜𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞, 𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐬 𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐬 y de 𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐨 en 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐨́𝐧 𝐒𝐨𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐲 𝐄𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐨́𝐧. A su vez, también desempeñé cargos como 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐨 de Investigación, 𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫 de Proyectos de Investigación y Director de Educación en Inteligencia Natural, teniendo la oportunidad de 𝐥𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐫 diversos equipos interdisciplinarios para lo cual apliqué un 𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐨 𝐝𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐜𝐫𝐚́𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐨, orientado a la tarea y por, sobre todo, basado en la comunicación y escucha activa de todos los miembros.

Considero que poseo habilidades claras para la toma de decisiones oportunas, capacidad para el trabajo en equipo y un claro pensamiento analítico, lo que me permite, unido a mis demás competencias profesionales, abordar labores concernientes a la enseñanza y/o desarrollo de proyectos con soltura y altruismo.

¿𝘊𝘶𝘢́𝘭 𝘦𝘴 𝘮𝘪 𝘰𝘣𝘫𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘰 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘧𝘦𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘢𝘭?
Continuar dictando y capacitando a personas en universidades, organizaciones y/o empresas en materia de educación, comunicación social y tecnología educativa, ya sea presencial o a distancia, tanto a nivel nacional como internacional.

𝐇𝐀𝐁𝐈𝐋𝐈𝐃𝐀𝐃𝐄𝐒 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐅𝐄𝐒𝐈𝐎𝐍𝐀𝐋𝐄𝐒

➤ Plataforma Moodle, E-ducativa, Canvas y Google Classroom.

➤ Aptitud para la redacción de clases, actividades, foros y evaluaciones multimediales para la modalidad a distancia.
➤ Gamificación y narrativa transmedia para educación.

Details: ['Germán Gómez Veas', 'Rector, Director, Consultor y Asesor', 'Chile']
About:
['Hasta Enero del 2022 fuí Director de Estudios y Desarrollo Institucional del Colegio Alemán de La Serena, colegio particular laico, mixto, con resultados pedagógicos destacados. Ahora vuelvo a Santiago y espero encontrar pronto una nueva posición.

En el ámbito escolar particular he sido Rector en tres colegios: en el Colegio Salesiano Liceo Manuel Arriarán Barros, en el Colegio Alemán de Puerto Varas y en el Colegio Saint Dominic de Viña del Mar. En tanto en la esfera de educación escolar pública fui Subdirector de Gestión Pedagógica del Municipio de Santiago, Director de Educación en el Municipio de Renca y he prestado asesoría en el ámbito educacional a las municipalidades de Las Condes, Providencia, Vitacura y Lo Barnechea.
Como profesor universitario en pregrado y en diversos posgrados he trabajado en la Universidad Adolfo Ibáñez; De los Andes, y Del Desarrollo, entre otras. También fui Director Académico del Instituto Profesional y Centro de Formación Técnica ENAC Caritas Chile.
En paralelo a las funciones de docencia en educación superior, por trece años fui consultor en materias de ética empresarial, realizando distintas actividades para compañías e instituciones muy diversas.
Como autor, he publicado en español los textos ¿Qué es la ética? y Amistad: el corazón de la ciudadanía; con sus versiones en inglés What is ethics? y Friendship. The heart of the citizenship.']

Details: ['Luis Bretel', 'Profesor en Universidad Tecnológica del Perú', 'Perú']
About:
['Educador con amplia experiencia en la formulación, implementación y evaluación de políticas de Educación, propuestas curriculares y metodológicas para la Educación Básica y la Educación Superior, tanto universitaria como técnica. 

Fue Responsable Pedagógico del Plan Piloto del Bachillerato Escolar entre los años 1998 y 2000. Desde entonces ha asesorado y acompañado a diversas universidades, institutos de educación superior tecnológica y colegios de educación básica en la construcción de sus propuestas curriculares y pedagógicas. Durante el 2014, entre mayo y diciembre, fue Director General de Educación Básica Regular, en el Ministerio de Educación del Perú.

Tiene amplia experiencia en el diseño de programas de modernización pedagógica, de la enseñanza y de la evaluación, a nivel nacional e internacional.

Profesor visitante, capacitador, asesor académico y pedagógico de diversas Instituciones Educativas y Universidades del Perú, Brasil, Chile, Colombia, Cuba, España y México.

Miembro fundador de la Red Panamericana de Aprendizaje Basado en Problemas y del Programa Iberoamericano de Estudio de Casos.

Fue Presidente del Fondo Nacional para El Desarrollo de la Educación Peruana- FONDEP (2013-2015) y conduce los Cursos de Metodologías de Enseñanza y Creación de Programas Educativos en la Maestría de Docencia Universitaria de la UTP.

Entre 2016 y 2019 acompañó el Proyecto de Implementación del nuevo Currículo Nacional en 8 colegios de Fe y Alegría y 6 redes de escuelas rurales acompañadas por Fe y Alegría.']

Details: ['Juan Francisco Reinoso', 'Rector Colegio Los Robles Miembro del Comité de Ética del CINME', 'Argentina']
About: ['A los 20 años comencé a dar mis primeros pasos en la educación formal. Durante todo este camino ha ido creciendo mi pasión por acompañar a jóvenes y adultos a descubrir aquello que despierta su más hondo anhelo. Entiendo la educación como la capacidad de estar presente en este proceso que cada persona va realizando, a su ritmo, a lo largo de su vida. Tengo la certeza de que todo lo demás: técnicas, estrategias, desarrollo de habilidades, apropiación de procedimientos intelectuales y de estudio, despliegue de hábitos intelectuales o "inteligencias múltiples" y cualquier renovación educativa, debe estar al servicio de este descubrimiento: el "propósito de mi vida", el propósito de la vida de cada persona, lo que algunos llaman: "vocación personal". Estoy seguro que la educación tiene como misión colocar a aquellos que están bajo nuestra responsabilidad, en la mejor situación posible para descubrir su vocación y poder seguirla.\nEste ha sido mi camino. En todos los ámbitos en los que me muevo actualmente (Colegio Los Robles; CINME; Postulación de Clarita Segura; Conferencias y congresos y en mi propia familia) veo que existe ese hilo que los une: desplegar mi vocación ayudando a que otros descubran y desplieguen la suya.']
Education: [["Universidad del Norte 'Santo Tomás de Aquino'", 'Profesor - Licenciado, Filosofía'], ['Facultad Latinoamericana de Ciencias Sociales', 'Diplomado superior en Bioética, Bioética/Ética médica'], ['Universidad de San Andrés', 'Curso de posgrado, Dirección Escolar para la Transformación Educativa (DETE)'], ['Universidad Favaloro', 'Curso de posgrado, Orientación Vocacional y Ocupacional'], ['Universidad Favaloro', 'Maestría en curso, Neurociencias'], ['Facultad Latinoamericana de Ciencias Sociales', 'Maestría en curso, Bioética']]
Skills: ['Investigación y desarrollo', 'Edición', 'Redacción', 'Organizaciones sin ánimo de lucro', 'Aprendizaje electrónico', 'Pedagogía', 'Comunicaciones internas', 'Gestión de proyectos', 'Microsoft PowerPoint', 'Microsoft Word', 'Docencia', 'Capacitación docente', 'Trabajo en equipo', 'Formación de personal']
Recommendations: [['Claudia Messing', 'Presidenta en Sociedad Argentina de Terapia Familiar (SATF)', 'Conozco a Juan Francisco Reinoso desde hace mucho años y he visto su incansable inquietud por aprender, profundizar e investigar en todo aquello que pueda colaborar con el mejoramiento de la calidad educativa en su colegio, pero también apoyar el crecimiento y fortalecimiento de los vínculos familiares, colaborar con el bienestar psíquico de la comunidad con la que trabaja, ser un excelente director de equipos de trabajo, con capacidad de liderazgo pero también de inclusión y participación de los profesionales que lo rodean. Sus inquietudes filosóficas lo mueven a nutrirse permanentemente del estimulo de otras disciplinas, Es un gran gusto tenerlo como interlocutor en tantas temáticas de interés educativo, emocional, social y espiritual'], ['Eduardo Abello', 'Representante Legal - Director Gral Colegio', 'Juan es una fuente de inspiración de lo que es ser un "excelente" rector de colegio, Con muchas virtudes, como el "buen humor", paciencia y perseverancia, y agrego su FE, los cuales me han servido y sirven como un ejemplo a seguir. Un placer haber compartido unos años como colega en el querido Colegio Los Robles.'], ['José Blanco Mengoni', 'Responsable Logística y Proveedores en Edesur S.A.', 'Recomiendo a Juan Francisco Reinoso por sus sólidos valores y sus habilidades demostradas. Tiene una gran experiencia en el liderazgo de distintos tipos de equipos, conduciéndolos con amabilidad y eficacia. Su sólida formación en distintos ámbitos del conocimiento (Educación, Ética, Filosofía, etc), le facilita una mirada multidisciplinaria capaz de abordar gran variedad de desafíos. Su riqueza personal brilla especialmente en su capacidad de escuchar, comprender y empatizar con personas de distintas edades, y hace que pueda guiar a individuos y equipos para alcanzar los desafíos que se propongan.']]

['Nombre de Perfil: RECEPTIVO
Palabras clave que describen el perfil:
Paciente – Meticuloso - Sistemático – Preciso - Pacífico - Tranquilo

Soy una persona sistemática, cooperativa y colaboradora, orientada a seguir procedimientos. Trabajo más cómoda y eficazmente en ambientes y situaciones estructuradas y bien definidas. Comúnmente actúo de manera ordenada, predeterminada y precisa, presto atención a los detalles.
Me comporto cautelosamente en la aproximación a los problemas y las decisiones. Es difícil que llegue a confrontar con colegas y, por lo general, actúo con prudencia y diplomacia. Soy paciente y escucho cuidadosamente a los demás, demostrando genuino interés por sus ideas, opiniones e información. Expreso mejor mis pensamientos en grupos pequeños y en situaciones de persona a persona. Me caracterizo por tener buenas aptitudes para el trabajo en equipo. Trabajo para mantener la armonía en un grupo mientras intento satisfacer a la gente, en un esfuerzo por evitar el conflicto.
Prefiero procedimientos operativos claros y consistentes, y evitar los cambios repentinos o abruptos. Soy una persona que se siente motivada por la seguridad, la consistencia y claridad en las instrucciones y normas, como también, recibir constantes refuerzos positivos y reconfirmaciones de que estoy haciendo las cosas bien. Soy capaz de aplicar un estilo de pensamiento lógico y analítico al resolver los problemas. No me gusta cometer errores y, para evitarlos, aplico un enfoque perfeccionista']

Sé que actualmente complementa sus actividades académicad con la gestión, donde sé que también destaca por su visión integral de la Educación Superior, su compromiso con la academia pero con la visión de la gestión optimizada de recursos tan necesaria para llevar a cabo cualquier proyecto de este tipo, con una notable visión de futuro, conformación de equipos y liderando efectivamente proyectos complejos. Sé que tiene un brillante futuro por delante, ya sea en la docencia como en la gestión académica.'], ['Efrain Miranda, Ph.D.', 'CEO, Clinical Anatomy Associates, Inc and Medical Devices Consultant', 'Tengo el gusto de conocer a Cristián hace ya algún tiempo y estoy impresionado por su dedicación personal como docente. Cristián no sólo prepara sus charlas y conferencias en detalle, sino que además hace el esfuerzo adicional de dar a sus alumnos elementos clínicos a través de la aplicación de imágenes radiológicas a la docencia anatómica. Esta es la base de Anatomía Clínica. En forma personal, reconozco el esfuerzo que Cristian ha hecho para integrar a sus clases la terminología médica aplicada, un elemento que no solo ayudará a sus alumnos en Anatomía, sino en toda su vida profesional en el ámbito de la salud. Prueba de esto es la publicación que Cristian hizo del libro sobre "Epónimos en Nomenclaturas Anatómicas". Estoy orgulloso de poseer en mi biblioteca privada una copia dedicada de este libro. En forma paralela Cristian desarrolla actividades en gestión académica como Secretario Ejecutivo de Postgrado de la Facultad de Medicina Finis Terrae en Santiago, Chile, realizando un trabajo permanente en la administración y gestión de los programas a su cargo. I have known Cristian for some time now and I am very impressed by his personal dedication as a university professor. Cristian does not only prepare his classes and conferences in great detail, but he does the additional effort to give his students clinical elements through the application of radiological images to the study of Human Anatomy. This is the basis of Clinical Anatomy. I recognize the effort that Cristian has done to integrate in his classes applied medical terminology, an element that not only helps his students in Anatomy, but will help them in their professional endeavors in Health Care. Proof of this is Cristian’s publication of the book “Eponyms in Anatomical Nomenclature”. I am proud to own a signed copy of his book in my personal library. Cristian also works in Academia as Executive Secretary of Postgraduate Courses for the Medical College of the Finis Terrae University in Santiago, Chile, administrating the programs of which he is in charge.'], ['Aurora Diaz Manrubia', 'Directora de postgrado y educacion continua en Universidad Finis Terrae', 'Un de los aspectos más destacables del desempeño profesional de Cristián como integrante de la Comisión Central de Postgrado de la Universidad Finis Terrae, es su capacidad para realizar su trabajo con gran diligencia y acierto ,tomando su trabajo en serio, no descuidando los detalles y entregando las solicitudes encomendadas a tiempo. Otra gran virtud de Cristián es su versatilidad, siendo capaz de encontrar soluciones a todas las tareas que se le solicitan, por muy diferentes que sean. Por tanto, es una persona totalmente recomendable para asumir responsabilidades académicas y para integrar en equipos de trabajo multidisciplinares.'], ['Rodolfo Sanzana C.', 'Lecturer - Académico en Facultad de Medicina en Universidad de Chile', 'Cristian, es un excelente profesional, el cual ha dedicado gran parte de su labor a la educación. Es un Académico intachable y tiene muy clara su labor como docente. Sabe traspasar sus conocimientos al estudiante, de forma que este los pueda entender completamente']]

Details: ['Wilmar Muñoz', '💡Planner, Estratega Creativa y Consultora de Negocios Online. Lic. En Educación Comercial. Magister en Investigación. Founder & CEO Bendita CreActividad: Consultoría y Formación.', 'Argentina']
About:
['¡Hola soy Wil! 

Mujer de negocios, creativa, perseverante, emprendedora apasionada por elección, speaker, mapeadora de ideas, bloguera, docente universitaria, asesora de proyectos de investigación, autora del Libro "Estrategias de Estimulación del Pensamiento Creativo", Co - autora del Libro “Plan de Acción del Líder Relacional”, creadora de infoproductos (ebooks, workbooks, etc.) asesora en técnicas de ideación, asesora en creatividad, innovación, metodologías ágiles, consultora de negocios. De profesión Licenciada en Educación Comercial, Magíster en Investigación Educativa, Diplomada en Neurociencias aplicadas al aprendizaje y a las ventas, Especialista en Pensamiento Creativo, Especialista en Marketing Digital.

Durante los últimos 19 años de mi vida me he dedicado a facilitar el conocimiento, lo considero como valor principal en el crecimiento de un país. En la actualidad, me dedico a Agencia de Consultoría y Formación Bendita CreActividad, a la Coordinación del Programa de Impacto Mayma LITORAL en Argentina, a la mentoría, asesoría y capacitación de emprendedores, negocios, instituciones académicas, ONGs, cooperativas y empresas. Trabajo con Modelos de Negocios y Lienzos Canvas, Marketing Estratégico, Marketing Creativo, Marketing de Contenidos en plataformas Online y Redes Sociales, Marketing Relacional, Marketing Buzz, Neuroventas, Neuromarketing, Metodologías Ágiles.

Ayudo a las personas emprendedoras, profesionales y empresas a gestionar, con creatividad estratégica, sus ideas de valor. Promuevo la creatividad y la ideación en los negocios.

Me apasiona, me mueve y me conmueve la creatividad como valor para la vida.

Fundé Bendita CreActividad: Consultoría y Formación https://www.benditacreactividad.com/
Fundé B - CreActiva: Agencia de Marketing Agile Online.']
